text: Ooh! I'm sure I still have the dragon costume we used the last time we snuck into the Dragon Lands! [giggles]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I think we might want something a little more practical this time.

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmmm... Well, it may be practical, but this disguise isn't flattering in the slightest!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] It's not supposed to be *flattering*. It's supposed to blend in!

speaker: Spike
text: Shh!

speaker: Garble
text: Hey-hey, look! It's our old friend *Sparkle-warkle*.

speaker: Spike
text: It's Spike.

speaker: Garble
text: Are you sure your *pony* friends didn't give you a *pony* name?

speaker: Spike
text: It's nice to see you too, *Garble*.

speaker: Garble
text: I didn't say it was nice to see you. It's not. I don't like you. Was I not clear about that?

speaker: Spike
text: Hey! That's my rock!

speaker: Garble
text: Oh, really? Then why aren't you sitting on it?

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: Dragons of Equestria, hear me! I have been Dragon Lord for longer than many of you can remember, and my reign has been extraordinary! [beat] *Agree with me!*

speaker: Dragons
text: [general agreeing noises] Torch! Torch! Torch! Torch!

speaker: Spike
text: Who is *that*?

speaker: Garble
text: It's Dragon Lord Torch, dummy.

speaker: Spike
text: No, next to him.

speaker: Garble
text: That's his daughter, Princess Ember. I wouldn't even *look* at her if I were you, unless you want Torch to eat you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] This is fascinating! Dragons are notoriously reckless, but they do whatever the Dragon Lord says!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: Unfortunately, according to dragon law, it is time for me to step down. Sad, I know. [beat] *Be sad!*

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: This is why I have summoned you – to compete for the throne in the Gauntlet of Fire!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: Whomever has the strength and fortitude to retrieve this bloodstone scepter from the heart of the flame-cano will be crowned Lord of the Dragons!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] When the scepter disappeared, the dragons stopped glowing! We are learning so much!

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, excuse me!

speaker: Garble
text: Ugh, you even *sneeze* like a pony!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: The Gauntlet is dangerous, for *I* designed it myself! Only dragons with my ferocity, strength, and determination will be able to finish. We will gather at the cliff when the sun is at its peak!

speaker: Spike
text: I don't want to be Dragon Lord *or* dragon toast, and I stopped glowing, so let's sneak out of here!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: Ah! Where do you think you're going, little dragon?!

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, uh, hi, your Lordship. Uh, I was just going home!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: You don't get to leave unless *I* say you can!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Dad, look at him. He's just a runt. Besides, he doesn't even wanna compete. Let him go.

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: He is rather tiny, heh-heh. I could squish him with my pinky claw. [chuckles]

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: That wasn't a joke. It was a fact. When I want you to laugh, I will say "*be amused!*"

speaker: Spike
text: Of course, your Lordship! I, uh, guess I don't understand dragon customs. Another reason why I shouldn't compete.

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: [sighs] Hm. Very well then, little dragon. I release you.

speaker: Spike
text: Thank you! [to Ember] And thank *you*.

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: [grunts] Where do you think *you're* going?

speaker: Princess Ember
text: To prepare for the Gauntlet.

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: No, you're not. You're not much bigger than that runt I just sent home!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: But I'm smarter than most of these boulderheads and you know it!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: Being smart won't help you win this Gauntlet! It was designed for a big, strong dragon to win, because it takes a big, strong dragon to lead! Besides, *I said no!*

speaker: Princess Ember
text: [growls] I hate when he does that!

speaker: Prominence
text: Ha. When I become Dragon Lord, I will make burps an official greeting!

speaker: Barry
text: Ha, you? Please! When I win, I will pillage Equestria for all their pillows. Why should these ponies be comfortable while we sleep on rocks?

speaker: Garble
text: That's nothing! When I'm in charge, the first thing I'll do is get revenge on those puny ponies! They'll regret they ever crossed Garble! We'll take whatever we want from Equestria and burn the rest!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Oh, my gosh!

speaker: Rarity
text: [hushed] Ooh, I can't believe I'm saying this, but I hope that burping dragon wins!

speaker: Spike
text: None of them can win! Equestria's in big trouble if any of them are in charge!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But what can we do?

speaker: Spike
text: There's only one thing to do, and only I can do it! I have to win the Gauntlet of Fire!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
Rarity
text: Oh...

speaker: Rarity
text: What do you mean *you* have to win the Gauntlet?

speaker: Spike
text: It's the only way to protect Equestria from the dragons. You heard them! They have horrible plans for ponies if they win! So somehow, I have to do it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There has to be another way. It's too dangerous. Besides, if you win, you'd have to stay here!

speaker: Spike
text: I know, but there's no other way to keep my friends safe.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, if you're staying to compete, then we're staying to cheer you on!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: I thought I released you, tiny one!

speaker: Spike
text: I decided to compete. I am a dragon, after all.

speaker: Garble
text: Are you sure? You can't even fly!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: All dragons are welcome to compete, but they do so at their own peril! Flying to Flame-cano Island is the first of many challenges you will face in your quest to find the bloodstone scepter! [roars]

speaker: Garble
text: Good luck! Just kidding. I hope you lose.

speaker: Spike
text: [gasps] [sarcastically] Thanks, Garble! I was planning on swimming anyway!

speaker: Rarity
text: You can do it, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: He's gonna drown!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, are you okay?

speaker: Spike
text: [gasps] Princess Ember!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: What do you think *you're* doing?

speaker: Rarity
text: Only saving your ungrateful scales!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Did that seaweed just talk? Ponies?! What are they doing here?!

speaker: Spike
text: They're my friends!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Friends? Dragons don't do friends.

speaker: Spike
text: Well, *this* dragon does.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Whatever. I don't care as long as none of you get in my way. I have a Gauntlet to win.

speaker: Spike
text: But I thought your dad said that—

speaker: Princess Ember
text: I don't care what my dad said! I'll show him and every dragon who thinks I'm just a little *princess* there are better things than being big and strong!

speaker: Garble
text: [scream] [grunts] Don't leave me here, Spike!

speaker: Garble
text: Ha-ha! Knew you'd do it. Your pony friends made you soft.

speaker: Spike
text: Uh-huh. You're welcome.

speaker: Garble
text: For what? I didn't say thank you. [sniffs] Wow, you even smell like ponies. [sniffs] Or is it coming from over there? [sniffing]

speaker: Princess Ember
text: [gruff voice] Uh, that's just me. I, uh, robbed some ponies on my way over here.

speaker: Garble
text: Huh, I like your style. Have I met you before? You kind of look like—

speaker: Spike
text: My, uh, old neighbor! Uh, Sandy... Rockbeach!

speaker: Garble
text: Stupid slingtails knocked me down! But I've wasted enough time making small talk. Get it? Ha-ha! Because you're too *small* to win this! I'm funny.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Why did you cover for me? You could've had one less competitor.

speaker: Spike
text: I could ask you the same thing. You could've told Garble about my friends.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Yikes... That looks rough. But that's what makes it a challenge.

speaker: Spike
text: Are you kidding? Those boulders are huge! Hey, what if we worked together? You fly me up there, and I'll help look out for boulders, like a second set of eyes!

speaker: Rarity
text: Pssst!

speaker: Rarity
text: [hushed] Spike! Are you sure it's a good idea to team up with Ember? You don't know her too well.

speaker: Spike
text: I do know she could've told Garble about you, but she didn't. I think we can trust her.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Her behavior does seem contradictory to everything I've noted about dragons so far.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Hey, you, little fella! I've thought about it, and your plan makes sense. Let's do it.

speaker: Spike
text: Really? Great! It's a deal!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Just so you know, this doesn't mean we're gonna pick flowers or exchange necklaces or whatever pony friends do.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Good luck. We'll meet you at the top.

speaker: Spike
text: Pull up! There's one on your tail!

speaker: Spike
text: Go left!

speaker: Spike
text: So what do we do now?

speaker: Princess Ember
text: I think we go through there.

speaker: Rarity
text: [yelps] Oh, that looks scary! I mean, you can do it!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Listen, Spike. I wouldn't have made it this far without you. So I guess, if you want to, we could keep working together. I mean, just until we get through that tunnel.

speaker: Spike
text: Okay!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] We'll be right behind you!

speaker: Spike
text: [gasps] Oof!

speaker: Garble
text: Urgh!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, you made it! Oh, we were so worried!

speaker: Spike
text: About us? [scoffs] That tunnel was cake! [groans]

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Wait. How did you two get through?

speaker: Spike
text: Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: [yelps] [panting] Oh, thanks, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: [sighs] It was nothing.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Nothing? You just risked everything to save her! And they're putting themselves in danger just to support you!

speaker: Spike
text: Well, that's just what friends do. Don't you have anyone who looks out for you?

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Not really. Unless I count you. [beat] Which I don't! Because we were only helping each other get through the tunnel, and now we're through the tunnel, so that's it.

speaker: Spike
text: Wait, what do you mean?

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Well, there's only *one* winner, *one* scepter, and *one* Dragon Lord. So I guess it's every dragon for themselves.

speaker: Spike
text: Oh. So we aren't really friends?

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Maybe if we were in Ponyland, but like I said, dragons don't do friendship.

speaker: Spike
text: I can't believe Ember ditched me.

speaker: Rarity
text: [muffled] Oh, you're better off. She was only looking out for herself. She's just like all the other dragons.

speaker: Spike
text: She's not, though. I know it. She saved me, even when she didn't have to. I don't care what she says. That makes us friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is it just me, or have we seen this crevasse three times already?

speaker: Spike
text: It's kinda hard to tell. They all look the same. Except for this one! Look! We made it! I can't believe I'm the only dragon to make it this far!

speaker: Garble
text: You're not! And I'm not losing to a puny pony-loving dragon like you!

speaker: Rarity
text: [yelps] [muffled] We have to do something!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [muffled] Look!

speaker: Spike
text: [screaming] Ember! I thought it was every dragon for themselves! Why did you save me?!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: That's what friends do! And I am. I mean, *we* are. I never should have left you back there. Agh, please don't make me talk about my feelings!

speaker: Garble
text: What the?! [growls]

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Spike! Get the scepter! [grunts]

speaker: Garble
text: [straining] Argh! Whoa!

speaker: Garble
text: [frustrated grunt] I'm sick and tired of you two helping each other! Dragons don't do helping!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: *These* dragons do! [grunts]

speaker: Spike
text: [panting] Whoa...

speaker: Spike
text: *Leave her alone!*

speaker: Garble
text: What? You?! You have the scepter?! But that means that you're...

speaker: Princess Ember
text: The Dragon Lord. Dragon Lord Spike.

speaker: Garble
text: [groans] [reluctantly] Dragon... Lord... Spike...

speaker: Spike
text: That's right! Uh... Now, go start your long journey home. And give every dragon you see on the way a hug. Don't tell them why.

speaker: Garble
text: Awww! But that'll be super embarrassing!

speaker: Spike
text: I command you to do it!

speaker: Garble
text: [annoyed noise] I can't believe this...

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Dragon Lord Spike. Hm, has a nice ring to it.

speaker: Spike
text: Dragon Lord Ember sounds a lot better.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: What? No. *You're* the Dragon Lord now.

speaker: Spike
text: The Dragon Lord is whoever brings the scepter back to your father! Besides, you'll make a great leader. I was just doing this to protect the ponies. But I know you'll protect them just as well as I would have.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: You sure about this?

speaker: Spike
text: Absolutely. My home is in Equestria with my friends.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Well, you'll have at least one friend here too. What are you doing?

speaker: Spike
text: It's called a hug!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Oh. I don't know if I like it. But... okay.

speaker: Spike
text: Mmmmm!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] Awww!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: Ember? You?!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: I know you didn't think I could do it, but I did.

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: I expressly told you *not* to do it, because you're not—!

speaker: Princess Ember
text: I'm not big and strong. I know. But you know what? I won anyway. So maybe it takes more than just being big and strong to be a good Dragon Lord!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: I was wrong, Ember. You might not be big, but you are strong and smart, and perhaps that counts for more than I thought. And you will make an excellent leader.

speaker: Princess Ember
text: Thanks, dad. [to dragons] *Agree with him!* Just kidding! That's not gonna be my thing.

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: [laughing] Dragons, hear me! I present to you our new Dragon Lord, Ember!

speaker: Dragon Lord Torch
text: [to Garble] Hm? What is the meaning of this?!

speaker: Garble
text: I can't tell you!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You did well, Spike. With Ember as Dragon Lord, the ponies will be safe and you've gained us a powerful ally.

speaker: Spike
text: And a new friend!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Plus, Ember said I could write to her anytime I had questions about dragon culture! With this much information, I'll be able to write a whole book on dragons!

speaker: Rarity
text: And I gained tons of ideas for a new line of camouflage clothing! I think I'll call it "Camo-Maud"!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: First lesson of the day, we very carefully set the table *without* using magic, so that— Yikes!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Did you...?! How? When? *What?!*

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: What?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I said no magic, You were supposed to do it by hoof so I could work in a friendship lesson.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Oh, I heard "set the table" and just kinda went for it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, if you *hadn't* used magic, you'd have heard me say, uh... this plate represents your head, this spoon is your heart, and the knives... are sharp! Always be careful with knives. [sigh] The metaphors make more sense when you're actually setting the table.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Should I... change it back?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I just want to make sure you're ready for this dinner. Princess Celestia will be joining us tomorrow night to see how the friendship lessons are going!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: If it's just you, me, and Princess Celestia, why are there *four* seats?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, the whole point is for you to bring a new friend. That way, the princess will see for herself just how far you've come. *And* how good a teacher you have.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Well, I can't choose. I like all your friends.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's the best part! You have to make a new friend!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: New friends? Hey, maybe I'll just force friendships by magically enslaving the entire population of Ponyville!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Starlight!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Kidding! [laughs nervously]

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Let's see. Make new friends in Ponyville, the friendliest place in Equestria. Shouldn't be hard...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Need to make a new friend, huh? I know just the pony for you!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Miss Starlight Glimmer, meet Mrs. Cake!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: How are you, dearie?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Are you baking? Can I help?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wow, Mrs. Cake! Look what your new friend made you!

speaker: Mrs Cake
text: [chuckles] New friend. I like the sound of– [gasps] *Howza-wowza!* A-Are you trying to put me out of business with your fancy magical-thingy-whatsit cake?!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Sorry...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [licks, swallows] In her defense, it *is* delicious! [chomps]

speaker: Applejack
text: I think I have just the pony for you, Starlight. Meet Big Mac!

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Eeyup!

speaker: Applejack
text: He's not much of a talker.

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: Nnope.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Oh, that's too bad. I love a good conversation.

speaker: Big McIntosh
text: [motormouth] Eeyup-yup-yup-yup-yup-yup-yup-yup-y-y-y-y-you did something! Whoa! What's happening? I feel really weird! I'm talkin' so much! And I'm so articulate! Enunciating with such precise pronunciation! *Annie Apple awoke and accidentally ate an auburn azalea!* [screams] *Make it stop!*

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I can't be friends with somepony who doesn't talk.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: ...And I guess my first instinct shouldn't be to magically command ponies to act the way I want them to?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Alright, I'll change him back!

speaker: Rarity
text: The trick to finding a new friend is to render yourself radiant. First impressions count a great deal, you know.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I'm glad you all got past *my* first impression.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, everypony deserves a second chance. Ooh! Now, I have a top-notch idea. I'm thinking pastel silk here and here with a crinoline underneath.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: You really think a new outfit will help me meet ponies?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, with the right outfit, you can do *anything*, darling!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: When will it be ready?

speaker: Rarity
text: Three weeks.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Dinner's tomorrow.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well then, how about a hat from the... [clears throat] ...clearance bin?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Ugh! Maybe not.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. Nopony's gonna make friends with you because of your *outfit*. The only thing you want a new friend draped in is *coolness*.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Like you?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, but you already know me, so... [gasps] [spitting] Spitfire! Heh. Sorry.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Who's that?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasps] Only the Wonderbolt-iest pony in the Wonderbolts! Come on, I'll introduce you!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You coming or what?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I guess my first question would be, "What's a Wonderbolt?"

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasps] You've *never* heard of the Wonderbolts?! Where have you *been*?!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [nervously] Enslaving villages, I guess...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Right.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: You're adorable, but probably not what Twilight had in mind.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [groan] What is going on? This is Ponyville! If I can't make a friend here, there's gotta be something wrong with *me*! [sighs] Okay, calm down. Nobody makes friends with a total stresscase.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [to herself] Stop stressing... *Stop stressing!*

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [sighs] This is *just* what I needed.

speaker: Trixie
text: [sighs] Tell me about it.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: You ever have one of *those* days?

speaker: Trixie
text: For me, they're *all* one of those days.

speaker: Trixie
text: I'm gonna start coming here every time I visit Ponyville.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I'm not from here either. I've been trying to make friends, but it's not easy. They're not saying it, but I think everypony knows about my past. I may have been a tiny bit... completely and utterly evil?

speaker: Trixie
text: Ponies judge me on my past too.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Finally, a pony I can relate to.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Soup spoon, salad fork, pasta spoon, strawberry pick. I'm beginning to think that after friendship, the greatest magic of all is proper silverware placement! [giggles]

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Twilight, guess what? I made a new friend!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's fantastic news!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: She's great!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Great!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: She's powerful!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Powerful?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: She's—

speaker: Trixie
text: Hello... princess!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Trixie?!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: You know each other?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You could say that.

speaker: Trixie
text: We've had our differences. What matters is Twilight gave me a second chance, and I appreciate it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: So, um, what brings you to Ponyville?

speaker: Trixie
text: The *Grrrreat* and *Powerful Trrrrixie* has come to perform a new stage show of grand illusion! I am calling it "The Humble and Penitent Trixie's Equestrian Apology Tour"!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [hushed] That's kind of a mouthful.

speaker: Trixie
text: [hushed] It's a working title.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Starlight? A moment? Over here? [hushed] I know I said make friends with *anypony*, but, well, with Trixie's past, and your past, I'm not sure she's the best... first friend.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: But whatever she did, you've forgiven her, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Of course. It's just... She wasn't the nicest pony.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Well, you did say anypony, and I just assumed that you'd trust me to make my own friends the way Princess Celestia trusted *you*.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sighs] You're right. I trust you. Just be back in time for the dinner.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Thanks, Twilight! You won't regret it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I hope not. [sighs]

speaker: Trixie
text: This magic show's gonna be the greatest thing Ponyville's ever seen!

speaker: Goldengrape
Cherry Berry
text: [unintelligible whispering] ...did you see...?

speaker: Sunshower Raindrops
Caramel
Shoeshine
text: [unintelligible whispering] ...did you hear...?

speaker: Trixie
text: Everypony always says they'll give you a second chance, but deep down, they never forget.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: That's what I'm worried about.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: What is it?

speaker: Trixie
text: I heard what Twilight said about me, and she's right. I wasn't very nice. So I'd understand if you didn't want to be friends.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Are you kidding? You're the first pony I've met who has any idea how I feel!

speaker: Trixie
text: Can you keep a secret?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: What are friends for?

speaker: Trixie
text: [hushed] The things I've done? I did them because I was jealous of Twilight. She's just the best at *everything*, and I wanted to beat her at *something*!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [hushed] Your secret's safe with me.

speaker: Trixie
text: Thanks. Want to help me unpack my wagon?

speaker: Trixie
text: I spend a lot of time on the road with my wagon, so it might be a *tad* messy.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Maybe I can help. I'm pretty good at organizing stuff. Magic props, brainwashed crowds...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Pssssssst! Pssst! *Psssssst*! Shhhhhh!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Uh, I'll catch up. I think there's something in my hoof.

speaker: Trixie
text: Sure. The wagon's right around the corner.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [hushed] So, how's it going with your new friend?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [sarcastically] Great. Thanks for asking in a completely not creepy way.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Because you know, if it isn't working out for any reason, I could introduce you to my friend here.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [deadpan] Nice to meet you.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: No, no! You can come out now!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You like music, right? DJ Pon-3'd be the perfect friend for tonight's incredibly important dinner with Celestia. You know, if you decide to make a last-minute change. Heh.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: So back at your castle when you said "I trust you", you meant "I *don't* trust you".

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [nervously] Who can really say who said what? I know I can't! [to DJ Pon-3] Can you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Starlight, I'm just trying to look out for you.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [sighs] I appreciate it, but you're wrong about Trixie. She's just like me. We have a real connection.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That's kind of what I'm afraid of. Oh! What about her?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Please, Twilight! I know you're trying to help, but I need to make friends on my own if I'm going to become a better pony.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But do you really think Trixie's the one to help you with that?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Wow. Trixie was right. You're not really giving her a second chance. I wonder what that says about how you feel about me.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Oh! Now he'd be perfect!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I was thinking. You said Twilight is better than you at everything, but that's not true. You're better at magic.

speaker: Trixie
text: Only when I'm wearing a soul-sucking evil amulet, so I don't think that counts. Funny story. Don't need to get into it.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I meant *stage* magic.

speaker: Trixie
text: Well, of course! Great? Yes. Powerful? Obviously. But I'm not the *best*. As great and powerful as I am, there's one trick I've never been able to do – the Moonshot Manticore Mouth Dive!

speaker: Trixie
text: [narrating] Only one magician has ever pulled it off – my hero, Hoofdini! You are supposed to blast yourself into the open mouth of a hungry manticore! After the manticore chews you up and swallows you, you magically step out of a box on the other side of the stage!

speaker: Trixie
text: Completely unharmed!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: That sounds very...

speaker: Trixie
text: Dangerous?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I was gonna say cool!

speaker: Trixie
text: I knew I liked you for a reason. I don't know how he did it! If I tried it, I'd get chewed up and swallowed by that manticore.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Not if you could use real magic.

speaker: Trixie
text: Obviously. Way to rub it in.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: No, I mean, I could help! You could start the trick, and right before you got chewed up, I could use magic to save you...

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: ...and make you appear in the black box!

speaker: Trixie
text: I guess that would work... But if you made one mistake, I'd be a goner.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Hah. When it comes to magic, I don't make mistakes. Maybe I could be your... magic show helper pony!

speaker: Trixie
text: We call it "assistant" in the magician biz. And... nopony's ever offered to help before.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Well, I'd be honored.

speaker: Trixie
text: You may have just made my great and powerful magic show even better! Which I didn't think was possible! We're gonna blow them away tonight!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [groans] I can't! Tonight's this incredibly important dinner with Twilight.

speaker: Trixie
text: Oh.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Can I vent for a minute?

speaker: Trixie
text: What are friends for?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Even after Twilight *says* she trusts me, she clearly doesn't trust me enough to choose my own friends. [sighs] I guess you were right. No second chances.

speaker: Trixie
text: Hmph, I wish I could say I was surprised. Well, lucky for *Princess Twilight*, I have *my* magic show tonight. If you *have* to go to the dinner, I completely understand. [dramatically] I just hope I find a way to survive the Moonshot Manticore Mouth Dive without my new assistant!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Starlight Glimmer should be here, heh, any minute, heh. Any minute now... [nervous laugh] [forced] How about I introduce everyone? Our friendship lessons are going so well! She made three new friends! She has such great taste in friends. I don't know where she would've learned that! [nervous laugh]

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: Starlight Glimmer? I thought you said "nosehair trimmers"! What's going on? I'm hungry! And my nose is too hairy. [snorts]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [nervously] Ha-ha, Cranky Doodle! You're so funny! If you'll excuse me, I'm gonna check the kitchen. Maybe she got lost amongst the, uh... artichokes! [nervous laugh]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Starlight? Has anyone seen Starlight Glimmer? I'm looking for her! *Trixie.*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: So *this* is the Humble and Penitent Trixie's Equestrian Apology Tour?

speaker: Applejack
text: Ain't that a mouthful of molasses.

speaker: Trixie
text: It's a working title! Oh, this is gonna be the greatest night of my life! Excuse me. *Our* lives.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [sighs] I'm so glad we're not at that boring dinner.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Ahem? You just decided to skip our dinner without telling me? Are you aware that, at this very moment, Princess Celestia is waiting for you at a table with exquisite silverware placement?!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Yes, but—

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is exactly why I didn't want you to make friends with Trixie.

speaker: Trixie
text: A-*ha!* You still don't trust me! But guess what, *princess*? It doesn't matter if you want to give me a second chance or not. Starlight had to choose between you and me, and she chose me! Your pupil chose me, so *ha!* I win!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: You win? That sounds like you just made friends with me to beat Twilight.

speaker: Trixie
text: Exactly! [beat] Wait! I mean, no! I got caught up in the moment. I like you. Beating Twilight is just a bonus. [gasps] Saying that didn't help, did it?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I should've known. Nopony else in Ponyville wanted to be my friend. Why would you? [controlled sobbing]

speaker: Trixie
text: Wait, it's not like that! I *am* your friend. [groans]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, you won. I hope you're happy!

speaker: Trixie
text: [sighs] Looks like the Great and Powerful Trixie is back to a solo show.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Trixie?

speaker: Trixie
text: ...Which is *exactly* the way she likes it! Thank you, Princess Twilight, for getting rid of that annoying pony who wanted to be my first friend! I am not sad at all! I definitely don't feel as if my heart is breaking into a million pieces!

speaker: Trixie
text: [unenthusiastic] Come one, come all. Come and see the Pathetic and Friendless Trixie's "Way-To-Go-Dum-Dum-You-Really-Messed-It-Up-This-Time Repentance Tour".

speaker: Trixie
text: *It's a working title!* [unenthusiastic] Behold, your fears come true. A pony-eating manticore.

speaker: Trixie
text: [unenthusiastic] For tonight, the Great and Powerful Trixie will be performing the Moonshot Manticore Mouth Dive.

speaker: Trixie
text: [unenthusiastic] Now, now, save your gasps for when I defy the beast's jaws of doom and appear inside that black box. [dramatically] I was supposed to perform this trick with my great and powerful assistant, who was also my great and powerful friend!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Starlight, when I first came to Ponyville, Princess Celestia gave me room to make my own decisions and my own friends. I need to give you the same freedom. I shouldn't have tried to pick and choose your friends for you. Just like me, you have to make your own decisions and your own friends.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: But... what if Trixie really *was* using me just to one-up you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: From what I've seen, she's the real thing.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But it's not my place to judge. It's all up to you.

speaker: Trixie
text: Starlight? If you're out there and you still want to be friends, let's be great and powerful together! [slightly echoing] Please?

speaker: Trixie
text: [woozy] Behold, the Peat and Growerful Triskie...!

speaker: Trixie
text: [amplified] And now, I'm proud to introduce my great and powerful assistant! [normal] And best friend. [amplified] Starlight Glimmer!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Trixie!

speaker: Trixie
text: What do you want?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I was wrong. I'm sorry. And I have to hand it to you. I could never have pulled off a trick like that.

speaker: Trixie
text: Thank you, princess.

speaker: Cranky Doodle Donkey
text: How do you get your hair to do that all the time?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Hey! Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hiya, Scootaloo! What's up?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: The Rainbow Dash Fan Club just decided – everypony's coming to see you when the Wonderbolts' new tour comes through Ponyville!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, it's great that you guys are going to the show, Scoot, but I won't actually be performing in it. Reservists aren't in the show unless one of the real Wonderbolts can't fly. [chuckles] I'll probably be working crowd control or something.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: You're still gonna be wearing a Wonderbolts uniform though, right?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: A Reservist one, yeah.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Hmm. That's good enough for me.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Whoa!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Rainbow Dash! Glad we found you. We need you in the show when we get to Ponyville. Flying.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: But she's only in the Reserves!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Not anymore, kid.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [slow gasp] You mean...

speaker: Scootaloo
text: [gasps] Rainbow Dash! You're finally a full-fledged Wonderbolt! Woo-hoo! [laughs] Yeah, Rainbow Dash! Whoo!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Heh. What she said.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, anypony seen my wing balm? I don't want to be stiff when I show up at Wonderbolt headquarters.

speaker: Spike
text: Got it!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Do you have time to tell us what happened, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, yes, we must know every detail!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Start from when you were a foal and you first knew your destiny was to become a Wonderbolt!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. Well, not much to tell, really. Spitfire told me the Wonderbolts need *me* to go on tour with them.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: That's really great. I know how long you've been waiting for a spot to open up.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah. Fire Streak decided to retire and teach full-time. Cloudsdale Flight School will probably be churning out Wonderbolts with him there. But guess who was at the top of the Reserve list.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, ooh, I know! Pick me!

speaker: Rarity
text: So what do you do now, Dashie?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I have to report to Wonderbolts headquarters this afternoon. It's only two days 'til tour starts, and I need to learn the routine.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You're leaving already?! [gasps] But we barely started your congratulation party! I haven't even thought about your going-away party yet!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Pinkie, I'm not leaving Ponyville. I just have to train for *this* show.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I hope everything goes well. Sounds like an awful lot of pressure having to learn everything so quickly.

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah. Good luck, Dash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Luck? Heh. Save that for the rest of the team.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Now that my awesomeness has finally been recognized, the other Wonderbolts will have to keep up or eat my cloud trail!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Everypony knows you're a great flyer, Rainbow Dash, but so are the rest of the Wonderbolts. It might be more challenging than you think.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aw, you're right! I mean, do I show up wearing sunglasses or not? Sunglasses are automatically cool, but anypony can put them on. Maybe I'd stand out more if I didn't.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Team briefings are every morning at—

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: 0720, because there were twenty ponies in the original E.U.P. Guard that became the Wonderbolts!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Right. And I know you've seen the academy bunks, but these are the official Wonderbolts barracks.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Built by Admiral Fairweather himself!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Don't forget rule number one, newbie. Always check both ways before crossing the runway.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, sure, but... nopony else is here.

speaker: Spitfire
text: They will be, and most of the Wonderbolts like to make a flashy entrance, so stay alert.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Right, no problem!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa! Is that General Flash's cap?!

speaker: Spitfire
text: And the original crest with the Wonderbolts motto on it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Spitfire
text: "*Altius volantis!* Soaring higher!"

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wow! [gasps] I mean, ha, cool.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Okay, newbie, we've got a show in two days, which means you gotta hustle your haunches to learn this routine. You got five minutes to get dressed and get outside to meet the rest of the team.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes, ma'am! I'll have all of the moves down by the end of the day!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Let's hope so. We're all expecting you to make quite an impression.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Lookin' good! Okay, you're about to take your first flight as an actual Wonderbolt. [sighs] No pressure. [stretching groan] Just gotta go out there and knock 'em off their hooves. Okay, Wonderbolts, get ready to meet your most awesome member ever!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Hey, look out!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh? Whooaaa!

speaker: Misty Fly
text: Whoa, most awesome entrance by a newbie ever.

speaker: Soarin
text: Are you okay, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Fleetfoot
text: More like Rainbow *Crash*.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, flight school! Get ready for Rainbow Dash! Hah—whooooa!

speaker: Hoops
text: More like Rainbow *Crash*!

speaker: Pegasi
Hoops
text: Rainbow Crash! Rainbow Crash! Rainbow Crash! Rainbow Crash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey! You guys buzzed me on purpose!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Not quite. You forgot rule number one, *newbie*.

speaker: Fleetfoot
Soarin
Misty Fly
High Winds
Surprise
text: Always check both ways before crossing the runway.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, well, I was just... testing you guys!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Alright, nopony got hurt and we got a lot to do, so let's forget about this and get flying!

speaker: Misty Fly
text: Classic rookie move, Rainbow *Crash*. That was amazing.

speaker: Spitfire
text: [through loudhailer] Higher, Crash! You're breaking formation!

speaker: Soarin
text: Check your nine, Crash!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Tighter, Crash, get in there!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [growls] My name's not Crash!

speaker: Surprise
text: Huh, could've fooled me.

speaker: Fleetfoot
text: Hey, Crash, I know it was a tough day today, but don't worry. You'll get the hang of it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Tough day? Please. If I can pull off a sonic rainboom, I can learn this routine. I'll have it down cold tomorrow. Probably even come up with a couple of improvements.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Rainbow Dash, over here!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes, ma'am!

speaker: Spitfire
text: I'm glad you're still here.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, yeah? Did you want some ideas on how to make the show extra-awesome?

speaker: Spitfire
text: Not quite. I know you've been a Reservist for a while, but the 'Bolts have a few of their own rules you might not know about. Like worst flyer of the day has to clean up the *whole* compound. Better get to it, Crash.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] [under her breath] My name's not Crash.

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Rest of main cast
Scootaloo
text: Surprise!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What?

speaker: Sweetie Belle
Apple Bloom
Scootaloo
text: Hooray, Rainbow Dash! Our favorite Wonderbolt!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We know you're probably tired, Rainbow Dash, but Pinkie wanted to throw you a real party.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Your best day [through megaphone] ever party!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [nervous laugh] Yeah. It was somethin', all right.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well we can't wait to hear all about it!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. And I'd love to tell you, I really would, but I'm pretty beat. [yawns] You know, from all the... excitement of my big day?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, is something wrong, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What could be wrong? I'm finally a Wonderbolt, which means everything has to be totally, perfectly awesome.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, no. Something *is* wrong. What happened, darling?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I told you, it's nothing! I mean, maybe some of the Wonderbolts started calling me Rainbow Crash...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no! Isn't that the same terrible nickname those bullies in flight school used to call you?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Why would they call you that?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Well, I kinda sorta fell into a garbage can. [whimpering]

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Urgh.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, look at the bright side! At least they didn't call you Rainbow Trash!

speaker: Applejack
text: So you started off on the wrong hoof. I'll bet every new Wonderbolt has a tough first day.

speaker: Rarity
text: Mmm-hmm! What you need is to find a positive way to stand out. As soon as you're known for something else, that nasty old nickname will be forgotten.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity's right. Why don't you think of the Wonderbolts like us? We're a team, but we all stand out in different ways.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's it! I'm gonna stand out in a different way, just like you guys! Goodbye, Rainbow Crash; hello, Captain Awesome!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Pinkie Pie] Good morning, everypony! Who's ready for a fantastic day of flying? I know I am! I just couldn't be more excited for the big show tomorrow. Are you guys excited? I'm excited! Actually, I'm always excited! Some ponies even call me "Dynamic Dash"!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Pinkie Pie] Because I'm so full of energy all the time! [panting like a dog]

speaker: Fleetfoot
text: Uh, Wonderbolts don't get excited, *Crash*. You gotta keep a level head to fly the way we do.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] [imitating Applejack] Well, of course I know that! But the truth of the matter is, you *should* be excited! It's the dream of near every little Pegasus pony to grow up and fly with the Wonderbolts! And here you all are doin' it!

speaker: Fleetfoot
text: So are you.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Applejack] True! Go ahead and call me "Forthright Filly" if you want. But shee-yucks, I like to tell it like it is, and I believe a pony oughta appreciate hard work payin' off like this, because bein' a Wonderbolt is somethin' special!

speaker: Misty Fly
text: We know.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Twilight Sparkle] You know, I was just reading about how dihedral wing angles can help increase stability in banking turns. It made me think that pre-flight checklists could really help increase our efficiency, so I went ahead and made them for everypony!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Twilight Sparkle] I'm always finding so much interesting information in books. In fact, a lot of ponies call me "Reading Rainboom".

speaker: Spitfire
text: [through loudhailer] *We all know how wings work, newbie! And we already have checklists! Now get off the runway!*

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Fluttershy] I'm so sorry. I was just trying to help because I care about all of the Wonderbolts oh-so much. Yessiree, just call me "Care Mare". [beat] Um, but if you're busy now, I can just come back later...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Fluttershy] Or, you know, not at all...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [to herself] Okay. [imitating Rarity] I must tell you how much I just *love* these uniforms. Why, ever since I was a foal, I've admired the mixture of bold lines and classic contours. They don't call me "Rainbow *Fash*" for nothing.

speaker: Soarin
text: Uhhhh... huh...?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [imitating Rarity] The "Fash" is for "Fashion".

speaker: Spitfire
text: Crash! I'm not sure why you're acting like this, but you need to stop.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I was just, you know, trying to show everypony all the awesome ways I can contribute to the 'Bolts.

speaker: Spitfire
text: I know you're excited to find your place on the team, but just focus on the routine for now, okay?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yes, ma'am.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Maybe this will help motivate you.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Crash?! Couldn't you just put my regular name on it?!

speaker: Spitfire
text: That's not how it works around here. We all have our nicknames on our jackets. Right, Clipper?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Clipper?

speaker: Soarin
text: Right, boss!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Now it's official. Welcome to the Wonderbolts, Crash! [laughs]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [groans] If I don't come up with something unforgettable to add to the routine, I'm gonna be Rainbow Crash for the rest of my life!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: This is gonna be so amazing!

speaker: Spike
text: I know! I'm almost as excited as Pinkie Pie!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I can't wait to see Rainbow Dash's first performance as an honest-to-goodness Wonderbolt! I hope there's cotton candy!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: We should all remember to be extra supportive for Rainbow Dash too.

speaker: Rarity
text: Excellent point. It's simply dreadful that she's had such a rough start after finally achieving her dream.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rainbow Dash is a pretty resilient pony. I'm sure she's shaken off her tough first day and turned it around by now!

speaker: Applejack
text: Speakin' of... Hey, Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Perfect! Hey, can I borrow Scootaloo?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Me? What for?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, heh, I just needed some help and figured the president of the Rainbow Dash Fan Club was the right pony for the job!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I thought the Wonderbolt Reserves were here to help.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, yeah, they're all busy doing, uh, official Reserve stuff. But don't worry! With Scootaloo's help, everything's gonna be awesome. Better than awesome!

speaker: Rarity
text: Does... Does that mean practice went well yesterday?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Gotta go.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: What are we doing up here, Rainbow Dash?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I just need a small favor from you that's really gonna make this show something special. Now, the Wonderbolts are gonna fly over this ridge right before the finale of the show. I'll fly by last, and when I signal you, you zip up the ramp on your scooter and kick the storm cloud into my path!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: What?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That kick will shoot off a lightning bolt right behind me, making me look totally awesome! And then I'll do some incredible Rainbow Dash flying with it to create the coolest, show-stoppingest, lightning-tastic light show anypony has ever seen!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Are you sure about this?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh-huh! It's gonna be so awesome! And nopony will ever call me "Rainbow Crash" after this!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, gotta go! Be ready for me, okay, Scootaloo?

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Um... okay...?

speaker: Announcer
text: [through loudspeaker] Mares and gentlecolts, fillies and foals of all ages! Look to the skies and prepare to be awestruck by the incredible flying prowess of... the Wonderbolts!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I hope Spike and Pinkie Pie are done getting their snacks, or they're gonna miss Rainbow Dash!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, don't worry, Fluttershy. Nothing would keep Pinkie Pie from missing this!

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh. Except maybe cotton candy.

speaker: Spike
text: Come on, Pinkie, the show's starting!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: One second! Just a little bit bigger please, but hurry! *Bigger!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: That was amazing! She's doing great!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *Bigger!*

speaker: Scootaloo
text: I hope this works.

speaker: Pinkie Pie

speaker: Pinkie Pie

speaker: Spitfire
text: Way to go, Rainbow Crash.

text: You gonna tell us what just happened, newbie?

text: I should hope so. You changed the routine without consulting me and put other ponies at risk. I've drummed flyers out of the 'Bolts for less.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I know, and I'm ready for whatever punishment you want. You guys were right to call me "Rainbow Crash". I've always been a standout flyer, but since I joined the Wonderbolts, I've only stood out for making mistakes. [sighs] It's been my dream my whole life, but... I guess maybe I'm not Wonderbolt material after all.

speaker: Soarin
text: Are you serious?! You're the most talented flyer we've ever had!

speaker: Fleetfoot
text: And you've saved all of Equestria like, a dozen times.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh, I—

speaker: Spitfire
text: Of course you're supposed to be a Wonderbolt. We've been waiting for a spot to open up ever since you joined the Reserves!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But... you guys all called me Rainbow *Crash*.

speaker: Soarin
text: Yeah, so? My nickname's "Clipper". You know why they call me that?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh... 'cause you're as fast as a ship?

speaker: Soarin
text: Because I clipped my wing on a flagpole as I was landing on my first day. Heh.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh.

speaker: Fleetfoot
text: "Flatfoot". My first day, I misjudged my landing and came down right on Spitfire's hoof.

speaker: Misty Fly
text: "Dizzy".

speaker: Surprise
text: "Slowpoke".

speaker: High Winds
text: "Hoof-in-Mouth".

speaker: Spitfire
text: You don't wanna know what they call me. [unintelligible whisper]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Whoa! That is so much worse than Crash.

speaker: Spitfire
text: Right?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So does this mean I'm... still on the team?

speaker: Spitfire
text: Do you think you can be part of this team and not constantly try to showboat?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I promise! I spent my whole life trying to be a standout flyer, but now that I'm a Wonderbolt, it's time to be okay with fitting in!

speaker: Spitfire
text: Good, because I really didn't want to miss the chance to tease you for *years* about this catastrophe! I mean, that crash was epic!

speaker: Spitfire
text: But you're on probation for a month. Got a problem with that?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [quickly] No, ma'am.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey. Rainbow Dash. We just wanted to check on you. Are you doing okay?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'm doing great, thanks!

speaker: Scootaloo
text: Sure you don't need any help?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nah. This mess is my responsibility, and I've gotta clean it up myself. And after this, Spitfire's got me cleaning the Wonderbolts' compound for the next month.

speaker: Scootaloo
text: So why are you in such a good mood?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Duh! Because I'm a Wonderbolt!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hey, Starlight! Ready to celebrate your first Hearth's Warming Eve here in Ponyville?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I was thinking I might just skip it.

speaker: Spike
text: Skip Hearth's Warming Eve?!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I just find it all a little silly. It's mostly a day dedicated to presents and candy, isn't it?

speaker: Spike
text: And why would you deny yourself presents and candy? That's crazy talk!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I *think* what Spike means to say is Hearth's Warming is about more than presents and candy. It's a time to spend with friends and family when we celebrate a very important day in Equestria's history.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I think to most ponies, it's just an excuse for silly songs and fun, not a day to remember some old story.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe you just haven't heard the *right* Hearth's Warming Eve story yet!

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Earth ponies, Pegasi, and unicorns sing songs around a hearth to fight back an eternal winter caused by the mythical windigos? Ha! Every foal and filly knows that story.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Not that one. My favorite holiday story, "A Hearth's Warming Tale"!

speaker: Spike
text: Oh, I love that one!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: This is the story of a powerful unicorn named Snowfall Frost, who hated Hearth's Warming Eve. It all began many moons ago in Canterlot...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [narrating] Every home in Canterlot was filled with holiday spirit. Every home... except one. It was said of Snowfall that she was almost as studied as Star Swirl the Bearded. *Almost*, since everypony knows that Star Swirl was an expert at everything from transfiguration, dimensional calibration, teleportation—

speaker: Spike
text: [narrating] We get it. Star Swirl's awesome.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [narrating] Right. The point is, Snowfall was also a powerful unicorn. She wanted to be perfect. Anything that got in the way of that was a waste of time.

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: [gasp] Well, that batch is ruined. Snowdash!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [narrating] Snowdash was Snowfall's loyal assistant.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What do you need?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Get this mess cleaned up. Those foolish ponies were ringing those blasted bells outside the window and I lost my concentration!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [under her breath] Whoa, ponies actually enjoying Hearth's Warming Eve. Where did they get *that* crazy idea?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer

speaker: Starlight Glimmer

speaker: Rainbow Dash

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: Work hard, learn, and use your skills to better Equestria. That's a worthy goal for any pony. [sarcastically] But, by all means, if you want to go home early, ignore all of the work you have, and spend the rest—

text: They are all too real, Snowfall, and your actions will allow them to return. The future of Equestria shall be bathed in a blanket of eternal snow!

text: No! I never meant for this to happen! I didn't understand! I didn't see how important Hearth's Warming Eve was! Please, spirit! I haven't cast the spell yet! Is there still time?! I'm sorry! [echoing]

speaker: Starlight Glimmer

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, my.

text: Snowfall Frost?

speaker: Starlight Glimmer

speaker: Rainbow Dash

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text: I was wrong earlier, about Hearth's Warming Eve. It's not all about singing and presents. The singing and presents are all about celebrating the ponies in our lives. The ponies we should listen to more often: our friends.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wow.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Dragon toenail? Uh... thanks?

text: I was in a hurry. I'll do better next time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [narrating] And from then on, it was always said of all the Hearth's Warming Eve celebrations, Snowfall's was the Hearth's Warmingest.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The end.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, that's it! Thanks for letting me read you the story. Guess you can call it a night. Spike and I are heading downstairs, and if you wanted to, you'd be welcome to join us.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Welcome to the party! Happy Hearth's Warming, Starlight.

text: Happy Hearth's Warming, Twilight.

text:

speaker: Starlight Glimmer
text:

speaker: Ponies

speaker: Ponies

speaker: Ponies
text:

Hearth's Warming Eve is here once again!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [panting] Come on! If we hurry, we can get there before the paper's even delivered to Rarity's house!

text: Maybe she won't read the article.

speaker: Applejack
text: I'm pretty sure Rarity's gonna read a review of her new boutique in Manehattan.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I still can't believe we all just blabbed everything that happened to that reporter!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I just hope it doesn't end up being an article about how her friends almost ruined the opening.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I think you're all overreacting. Rarity's our friend. If anypony is gonna understand, it'll be her.

speaker: Rarity
text: [grimly] I was wondering when all of you were going to show up.

speaker: Rarity
text: [excitedly] Now we can all read the review together!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle

speaker: Rarity
