speaker: Fluttershy
text: But—

speaker: Rarity
text: *No spoilers!*

speaker: Rarity
text: Now, is everypony ready to hear what I'm sure is a stellar review that describes in stunning detail exactly how each of you contributed to the successful opening of Rarity For You?

speaker: Rarity
text: [clears throat, reading] "Many a pony has tried their hoof at joining the ranks of the elite fashion trendsetters currently ensconced in the boutiques of Manehattan's famed Saddle Row." [giggles, continues reading] "Some might say it's the ultimate achievement in Equestrian fashion, and never before has a reporter been granted such unfettered behind-the-scenes access until now!"

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I wish it had been more fettered.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, uh... [mutters] Ah! [reading] "I sat down with..." [giggles, continues reading] "...Rarity and her friends after the opening to get the inside scoop, and what a scoop it was!"

speaker: Buried Lede
text: Okay, kid, ya successfully opened a shop in Manehattan and that's no mean feat! Most ponies might wonder what it feels like. Here's how it's gonna be: I'm gonna interview you and your friends so I can paint a picture of how it all came together. A word picture, mind you, not an actual picture. Any questions?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, I was wondering—

speaker: Buried Lede
text: Let's get started! Ms. Rarity, you've got shops all over Equestria, but this was your first time trying to make it in the big city. What made ya think you could tackle it on your own?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, I wouldn't say *all* over Equestria. I just have two other boutiques: one in my hometown of Ponyville, and one in Canterlot. Uh, still, when I decided to open *this* one, I was nothing but confident.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Let's just say that if I *could* choose, I probably wouldn't do it *that* way again. Heh.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Well, it wasn't the funnest party ever...

speaker: Applejack
text: It was a plum-puckered, pig-pushin' disaster!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: After a lifetime of awesome, I think everypony's allowed to mess up every now and then, right?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait, are you writing this down?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, it didn't go exactly how I thought it would, but it, um, started out all right.

speaker: Rarity
text: Welcome to Saddle Row, an entire street lined with the most fashionable boutiques in all of Equestria!

speaker: Applejack
text: If it's supposed to be the most *fashionable* block of shops, where's Stinky Bottom's Discount Hat Emporium?

speaker: Rarity
text: I suppose it didn't make the cut. [gasps] Here it is! Rarity For You!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity, it's lovely. But are you sure you'll be ready to open tonight?

speaker: Rarity
text: No need to fret over a mere moderate amount of preparation. My clothes arrive soon, my sales associate after that, and with a little... dusting, we'll be ready for the grand opening tonight.

speaker: Mr Stripes
text: Rarity! So good to see you! Your store, it's going to be a very good place, I think! [laughs]

speaker: Rarity
text: Mr. Stripes owns the building. He's a very pleasant landlord. Although he *can* be pushy at times. [beat] Okay, *all* the time.

speaker: Mr Stripes
text: You've met my daughter, the apple of my ear, the hay in my hoof? You will let her work with you.

speaker: Rarity
text: [chuckles nervously] It's just, I'm dreadfully busy preparing for tonight's grand opening, as you can see.

speaker: Mr Stripes
text: There are only two things I love more than being pushy. One is my daughter. The other is miniature doll furniture. And I would sell my entire mini-furniture collection to make my daughter happy. You understand?

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm sorry. I just don't think it's going to be possible.

speaker: Mr Stripes
text: Let me say another way... Hire her or I raise rent until you no can afford!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, uh, welcome aboard.

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: [loudly] First idea! Instead of clothes, we sell glow-in-the-dark teeth! Like this. [chomp, chomp] But they glow in the dark!

speaker: Rarity
text: Golly, what a splendid idea! [chuckles nervously]

speaker: Rarity
text: Glow-in-the-dark teeth! What was she thinking?!

speaker: Rarity
text: Aah! Fluttershy, your assistance is required in the stock room, posthaste!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Aw, hello.

speaker: Rarity
text: But what are they doing here?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Smoky made too much noise eating garbage, so Softpad's mother made them move out of the trashcan.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Then Smoky Jr. found a nice home in the crawl space behind the building. But Mr. Stripes demolished it, so they were temporarily camped out in the back until they found a new place to live.

speaker: Rarity
text: No, no, no! I can't have a family of rubbish-scented raccoons living in my boutique!

speaker: Rarity
text: Uh, did you hear that?

speaker: Rarity
text: [annoyed] Heh. Turns out there's a Club Pony Party Palace upstairs.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [excitedly] Turns out there's a Club Pony Party Palace upstairs!

speaker: Rarity
text: I'm sorry. Could you please ask her to turn it down? Could you ask her to turn it down, please? [pleading] Turn it down, please! [sobbing] Oh, please!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh! Foals today listen to their so-called "music" far too loud. I realize that makes me sound like an old mare. But this is business!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I wish we were having as much fun as *they* are.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, sweeping can be fun, too. [to the beat] Sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep. Sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Only Twilight could make a dance remix about sweeping. I mean, how lame is that?

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah. It wasn't even catchy.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Nope.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [to the beat] Sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Twilight Sparkle
text: [to the beat] Sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep, sweep...

speaker: Rarity
text: Apparently, DJ Pon-3 has a residency at the Party Palace upstairs, but security won't let me speak to her.

speaker: Rarity
text: Aah! What in the name of Celestia was that?!

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: You know how most stores have a little jingle-bell when the door opens? Ahem. I thought we should have something with a little more pizzazz! So, I installed one of Daddy's antique horns.

speaker: Rarity
text: [sighs] We'll have to do something about that, after I think of a way to quiet down that music. And after I finish designing the window display!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ahh! Wait, is this my merchandise shipment from Ponyville? It's completely disorganized! A—A—... [sighs]

speaker: Rarity
text: Gesundheit! Oh, Miss Pommel! I'm so glad to see you! Now, as the sole sales associate at Rarity For You, I hate to add to your already overflowing plate of responsibilities, but it looks as though we have just a tad more to do before tonight than I thought.

speaker: Coco Pommel
text: Actually, I— [sneezes] I can't work tonight.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh? Why not?

speaker: Rarity
text: Feel better, my sweet. We'll manage without you... somehow. And we'll manage glowing teeth and car horns and disorganized clothes and dance music! Am I forgetting anything?

speaker: Rarity
text: [sobbing] What am I going to do?!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, opening a store in Manehattan is a pretty big deal. It's natural that Rarity would be a *little* stressed about how it was going. Since it wasn't going well. Still, I think she handled it all right.

speaker: Rarity
text: My dream is doomed! Doomed, I tell you! *Doomed!*

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know things haven't gone perfectly so far, but we've done this kind of thing before. If we all work together—

speaker: Rarity
text: I appreciate the offer, but this is Manehattan. To make it in the fashion scene here, everything has to be perfect. The perfect location! The perfect clothes! The perfect opening!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Maybe we should just postpone.

speaker: Rarity
text: Postpone?! Darling, tonight is the last night of the fall season. If we don't open tonight, it won't be...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [sighs] Perfect.

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes. I know what needs to be done. I just need more of me! Oh, how I wish I could make copies of myself!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yeah... Making copies of yourself always *sounds* like a great idea, but before you know it, you're locked in a room with fifty Pinkie Pies watching paint dry.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We can do this. And we can stay true to your vision.

speaker: Rarity
text: You'd do that? Fluttershy, you'll handle those... strong-smelling raccoons for me?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Of course.

speaker: Applejack
text: Leave Plaid Stripes to me. I'll handle her and her, uh, "good ideas".

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, ooh, ooh! And I can go upstairs to that nonstop party and have tons of fun and eat some cake and set off party cannons and—

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And then make them be quiet.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm pretty sure I know somepony who wouldn't mind organizing this merchandise shipment for you. [beat] I'm talking about myself. [beat] [pleading] Oh, please, let me organize it!

speaker: Rarity
text: This all sounds splendid, but I don't even have a single employee, and I'll need the best of the best.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Leave the hiring to me.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! This is it, my dears. If you can handle these problems, I'll focus on the designs for the front window display. We'll show Manehattan what Rarity For You is all about! Oh, what would I do without you?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What would she do without us? Huh. Lemme think. [imitating Rarity] "Darlings, I'm absolutely doomed, doomed, doomed!" [laughs, normal voice] Heh, I sound just like her!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hey, you're not writing this down, are you?

speaker: Rarity
text: Now for the perfect window display. Hmm.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, I can't really stop a super fun party in the middle of mega-happy fun times, can I?! Oh, what would Rarity want?!

speaker: Rarity Devil
text: Keep that party going 'til the break of dawn!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Really?

speaker: Rarity Angel
text: Indubitably! And as for the roof, get jiggy! Raise it, Pinkie! Raise it like you've never raised it before!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh! If you say so!

speaker: Rarity Devil
text: Oh, please, Pinkie Pie. Never in a million years would I say such balderdash!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Obviously, DJ Pon-3 only plays the sickest of beats. I just wouldn't want her to miss out on the coolest new music straight from the back-alley underground, zip-zap party scene! [to DJ Pon-3] I'd play the whole thing if *I* were you, no matter what other ponies think.

speaker: Dancers
text: Awww.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Rarity For You is only hiring the best of the best. And to me, that means the fastest. Now, uh, before we begin, uh... [to herself] Am I doing this right? What would Rarity want? [to applicants] New plan!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Who can be the first one to tell me what fabric this is?

speaker: Blue Bobbin
text: That's organza.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are you sure?

speaker: Blue Bobbin
text: It's a thin, plain weave. Sheer fabric traditionally made from silk, so... yeah.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I don't know the first thing about clothes. Pretty much all I can do is look at something and tell you if it's clothes or not. This chair? Not clothes.

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: See if you can keep up with me here. What are all clothes made of?

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, fabric?

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: Bingo! But not in this store. Uh-uh. Not anymore.

speaker: Applejack
text: Oh, no?

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: Two words for you: "spoon clothes". All our clothes will be made of spoons!

speaker: Applejack
text: [sighs, to herself] What would Rarity want? [to Plaid Stripes] You know, I like you, Plaid Stripes. If it were up to me, we'd have a spoon clothes store right next to Stinky Bottom's Discount Hat Emporium. But it ain't up to me, so the answer is no.

speaker: Applejack
text: Personally, I think spoon clothes ain't such a bad idea. Useful, too. Eatin' soup, stirrin' gumbo, diggin' little holes.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: There. Perfect. Although, what would Rarity want? Maybe she wouldn't like it done by color. Guess I have to start over!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Hello, Smoky, Softpad, Smoky Jr.? I have some... interesting news. I, oh... I'd like you all to stay here forever, but... [to herself] What would Rarity want? [to the raccoons] You have to move out! [sobs]

speaker: Rarity
text: A window display is the first thing customers see, and if they like it, they'll walk inside and experience the glory that is my boutique.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [stammers] I don't know which one of you to hire! Just... keep guessing fabrics!

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: Daddy, Rarity's friend doesn't like my ideas!

speaker: Mr Stripes
text: Spoon clothes is good idea!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, no! Not a shopping music mashup!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry!

speaker: Rarity
text: How's it—

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: When you write the story, could you maybe skip over the part where we locked Rarity in the window display? [nervous chuckle]

speaker: Rarity
text: Hello? The door appears to be stuck!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yep. We're workin' on it!

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmm. Well, shouldn't let this time go to waste.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: How did this happen?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I shut down the party.

speaker: Applejack
text: I told Plaid Stripes no.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I asked the raccoons to leave.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I asked a lot of fabric questions.

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Applejack
Pinkie Pie
text: Just like I thought Rarity would want!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Rarity asked us to help her with everything because she knows all of us so well. [to Fluttershy] She knows how much you care for animals. She'd trust you to solve the problem *your* way. [to the others] Maybe we should all do the same. Doing this our way *is* what Rarity wants. It's not too late. Let's all dig in and we can fix this.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Before Rarity finds out how bad we messed up.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sorry I asked you to leave. The place is yours if you wanna stay. Though I would like to ask you all just one favor.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm sorry I made you play that un-fun, super-boring music. But if you're up for it, I have an idea to make the party even better!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, I *don't* get fabric, but I *do* get speed. And I need somepony fast enough to help all the customers Rarity's gonna have. So... first one to the river and back gets the job! [beat] It's a race! Go!

speaker: Applejack
text: [clears throat] Mr. Stripes, I owe your daughter an apology. She's got good ideas, and I should give 'em a chance. So here's what I'm thinkin'.

speaker: Rarity
text: Perfect!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: [awkwardly] Wow, looks like we fixed that door just in time!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] Oh! What's all this?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: The whole place organized by style, cross-referenced by size, and reverse-indexed by fabric. She'll be able to find anything in three seconds flat! It was some of my best work.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! I knew I could count on you! All right... I suppose this is the moment of truth...

speaker: Rarity
text: Rarity For You is now open!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, dear. I wasn't quite prepared for such a crowd. How will I handle them all?

speaker: Blue Bobbin
text: My name's Blue Bobbin. I'll be your personal shopping assistant this evening.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Right this way, everypony, and one of our talented salesponies can help you out!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Honestly, they were all pretty slow. But they finished the race. Plus they knew a lot more about fabric than I did. So, I hired them all!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: The way I see it, Rarity designs fashion, DJ Pon-3 designs beats. What better combination than a boutique/dance club?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: After a quick bath, they were more than willing to help!

speaker: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
text: Ah, a blue corn reduction with shallot confit! But how can I possibly enjoy it without a—

speaker: Plaid Stripes
text: Spoon?

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh. Toldja spoon clothes ain't such a bad idea.

speaker: S05E16 Unnamed Earth Stallion #10
text: [sips] Mmm! Exquisite! This is the most whimsical and wonderfully fashionable boutique I've ever seen!

speaker: Rarity
text: [reading] "In the end, Rarity's grand opening was a smashing success! True, it got off to a rocky start, but somehow this rag-tag group of ne'er-do-wells..." [to ponies] Oh, heavens, I think he means you. [continues reading] "...came together and created the perfect boutique. A vision of Rarity combined with the expertise of her friends! This reporter, for one, is a believer." [to ponies] Why didn't you tell me there were so many problems?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: We all figured you had enough on your mind.

speaker: Applejack
text: And we didn't want you to think that the opening wasn't perfect.

speaker: Rarity
text: [giggles] "Ne'er-do-wells" or not, I know I can always count on all of you. And nothing could be more perfect than that.

speaker: Aloe
text: Um... Miss Rarity? Eh, how much longer are you planning to stay in here, darling?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, dear. Is somepony else waiting?

speaker: Aloe
text: Oh, no, no. I just don't want you to get all... What is word? Pruney.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh. Uh, well, I'm just waiting for Applejack. It's been so long since we've had a relaxing day at the spa together. I'm quite certain she'll be along any moment.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hey, there, Rarity. I really tried to get here earlier. I just can't believe how much time my chores are takin' up these days. At least now we'll finally get to spend some quality spa time together. Right?

speaker: Aloe
text: Okay, fillies, that's it. We are closing up for the day.

speaker: Applejack
text: Aw, shucks, Rarity. I guess I missed the whole day. I sure am sorry.

speaker: Rarity
text: Me, too.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Hi, Rarity!

speaker: Rarity
text: Morning, Twilight, Spike. Good heavens, that's a lot of empty pie plates.

speaker: Spike
text: Uh... yeah. We were just heading to pick up some fresh pies. Heh. I don't know why we keep running out at the castle. [nervous laugh] What are *you* gonna get?

speaker: Rarity
text: Applejack, actually. Although, I'm quite sure she'll be too busy once again.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What do you mean?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, nothing. It's just that Applejack and I haven't had one of our spa days in ages.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You two really should set aside some time.

speaker: Rarity
text: Darling, I have been trying for moons! But Applejack is so busy these days, it's next to impossible.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow. I didn't realize Applejack had so much to do.

speaker: Spike
text: Hey, Applejack! Another order of pies, please.

speaker: Applejack
text: Sure thing, Spike!

speaker: Spike
text: Aah! Dah! Whoa-oa-oa!

speaker: Rarity
text: I don't suppose those pies are the last chore on the schedule for today?

speaker: Applejack
text: Gah! Land's sakes! Is it time for our spa day already? Rarity, why don't you go on ahead and I'll meet ya there?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh! *Please*, Applejack, let's not kid ourselves!

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, it ain't 'cause I don't wanna. But the work on the farm has just been takin' up more and more of my time.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I hate seeing you two not spending time together. Can't you get somepony else in your family to take over for a bit?

speaker: Applejack
text: [sighs] Wish I could. But Granny, Big Mac, and Apple Bloom all have chores of their own. And today, they're all busy takin' the harvest to market.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I know we're not farmers, but I'm sure Spike and I could handle things for a little while.

speaker: Applejack
text: Maybe...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Is there *one* chore we could do?

speaker: Applejack
text: Well... I suppose if you two got started on feedin' the pigs, I could *maybe* leave for an hour.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oooh! An hour of spa perfection? I can work with that!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Perfect! You head out to the spa, and Spike and I'll take care of things here.

speaker: Spike
text: Whoa! Dah! Whoa!

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, yeah. We totally got everything covered.

speaker: Applejack
text: [sighs] Okay. This list pretty much covers everything you need to know to feed the pigs. But, uh, maybe I should go over it with you just to...

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Applejack, please. If there's a list involved, I am one hundred percent on top of it.

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, right.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: And don't worry about things here! Spike and I have totally got this! I mean, it's just feeding the pigs. How hard could it be?

speaker: Spike
text: Uh, Twilight?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Whoa.

speaker: Applejack
text: I'm glad we're doin' this, Rarity. I've been puttin' work before our spa time for too long. I know we've only got an hour, but I can't wait to have a steam.

speaker: Rarity
text: A steam is just the start. I know exactly what we'll do, and an hour will be perfect.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Okay, Spike, ready with that list?

speaker: Spike
text: Ready.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Let's do this!

speaker: Spike
text: [reading] "Step one: open the gate."

speaker: Spike
text: Okay. [reading] "Step two: *close* the gate."

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Huh?

speaker: Spike
text: Mm. That's what it says.

speaker: Spike
text: [reading] "Step three: walk away."

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: "Walk away"? Really?

speaker: Spike
text: [intonation of "I don't know"] Mmm.

speaker: Applejack
text: I just hope Twilight and Spike can handle things until I get back.

speaker: Rarity
text: Now, Applejack, if we are really to enjoy this time together, you simply must give yourself over to the idea that you are off-duty and try to relax.

speaker: Applejack
text: I know. You're right. I really am glad we're doin' this. And as long as it's only an hour, I'm sure everythin' will be just fine.

speaker: Rarity
text: Exactly. Now kindly step this way. Relaxation awaits.

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] Rainbow Dash! What are *you* doing here?!

speaker: Applejack
text: Yeah. I didn't think spa treatments were your thing exactly.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: What?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, they're totally not. At least, not the froufrou kind.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ah.

speaker: Applejack
text: Huh.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Yeah, I, uh, I think I tweaked something at Wonderbolts practice the other day. I just came in for a deep tissue sports massage.

speaker: Lavender Essence
text: Ah, Miss Dash, I am so sorry, but we are running just a tad behind, and we are not quite ready to start your pampered muscle massage and indulgent hooficure just yet.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh! [chuckles nervously] I-I'm pretty sure that wasn't what I signed up for.

speaker: Lavender Essence
text: But they are your usual.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And it seems like you're really busy today anyway! I'll just come back tomorrow. [to Rarity and Applejack] Uh, see you two later! Have fun! [to Lavender Essence, whispered] But put me down for the same thing.

speaker: Applejack
text: [chuckles] Too bad Rainbow Dash just *hates* those "froufrou" spa treatments. She could have joined us for a nice steam. Hoo-wee! I can't wait.

speaker: Rarity
text: [laughs] Indeed. Although, if they couldn't fit Dashie in, I wonder just how far behind things *are* running. Obviously, we're on a very tight schedule.

speaker: Rarity
text: [grunts, gasps] Well, maybe not everypony is waiting for the steam room.

speaker: Caramel
text: Oh, no. No, that's exactly what we're waiting for. Oh, I hope you're not in a hurry.

speaker: Applejack
text: So everypony here wants a steam bath?

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, the solution is obvious. We'll simply have to start our short time at the spa with something else.

speaker: Applejack
text: [scoffs] Nothin' doin'. I came here to have a steam, and that's just what I'm gonna get!

speaker: Rarity
text: But, but, it'll take most of our hour just to get through this line!

speaker: Aloe
text: RRRRarity! My favorite customer! Mwah! Mwah! And Appleyack? Well, it certainly has been a long time since you two were here together! So lovely to have you back.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, I wish I could say the same.

speaker: Aloe
text: Yes, the wait time for the steam room certainly has been getting worse lately. But I'm sure we'll be able to accommodate your usual treatments.

speaker: Applejack
text: Not without my steam!

speaker: Rarity
text: Apparently, Applejack won't consider starting her time at the spa without a steam, and we only have an hour.

speaker: Aloe
text: That is a problem.

speaker: Rarity
text: Applejack, where are you going?

speaker: Applejack
text: Um, why are y'all just standin' here?

speaker: Buddy
text: Ugh! Just waiting for the steam to build up.

speaker: Spoiled Rich
text: Without steam, a steam room's just a room, and I've got plenty of those at home. Because I live in a mansion.

speaker: Aloe
text: It *has* been taking longer for the steam to reach the Ponyville Day Spa quality. We even had to add a warm towel service. So sorry for the delay, everypony. Please help yourselves.

speaker: Applejack
text: So if you're not gettin' enough steam, that must mean there's not enough hot water.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ooh, Applejack, honestly, can't we just start with a hooficure? We're going to run out of time.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hmm.

speaker: Applejack
text: Ha! Now what do we have here?

speaker: Rarity
text: The laundry room, of course. And at this point, I'm considering soaking my hooves in one of the machines so my time here isn't a total loss!

speaker: Aloe
text: The Ponyville Day Spa prides itself on sanitary conditions, and fresh linens are integral part.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, sure, but have you *always* run every single one of these here machines full bore all day, every day?

speaker: Spa Worker
text: The answer is no. But ponies sure do love the warm towel service.

speaker: Applejack
text: Hmmm.

speaker: Spa Worker
text: Eh, you are all wanting towel?

speaker: Applejack
text: Looks to me like you don't have any left.

speaker: Spa Worker
text: Well, like I said, warm towels are big hit.

speaker: Applejack
text: I think I figured out the problem. You've got a small leak, and that means the steam takes just a little longer to build up. And while ponies wait, they get cold. Cold ponies start wrappin' themselves in towels, and all those dirty towels have to be cleaned because Ponyville Day Spa prides itself on cleanliness.

speaker: Spa Worker
text: Eh, what?

speaker: Applejack
text: Basically, losin' steam makes you use more towels. That means you do more laundry, which uses up the hot water you need to make more steam, so the problem just keeps gettin' worse.

speaker: Aloe
text: Ah! I had no idea.

speaker: Rarity
text: Wonderful. Now that we've solved the great steam mystery, we can finally get back to our... significantly less than an hour of relaxation.

speaker: Applejack
text: Rarity, are you kiddin'? I can't just leave things like this. I'm gonna need my tools.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ahh!

speaker: Applejack
text: Whew! Now that that leak's fixed, ponies won't get so cold they use up all those towels! And without all that laundry, there'll be plenty of hot water for all the steam anypony could want!

speaker: Spa Worker
text: And I only have to be doing vash once a day!

speaker: Aloe
text: Wow, Appleyack! Have you ever considered a career in the spa industry? I'm sure I can find something for you.

speaker: Applejack
text: [laughs] No, thanks. I'm just relieved I can finally relax in the steam. What do you say, Rarity?

speaker: Rarity
text: It sounds lovely, Applejack, but... unfortunately, you spent so much time fixing the steam room, we don't have any time left to use it. Honestly, how in Equestria did it never occur to you to check for leaks?

speaker: Aloe
text: There's just so many other things to worry about! I suppose ve get used to the way things are, and ve don't realize there vas problem.

speaker: Rarity
text: You obviously need an outside eye to evaluate the situation. It's lucky for you Applejack is too stubborn to relax!

speaker: Applejack
text: Uh, I'm sorry, Rarity. We'll just have to do this another day. Twilight and Spike should be done feedin' the pigs by now.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight is a very capable pony. I'm sure she can figure out what to do next.

speaker: Applejack
text: Look, I know Twilight's a princess and an Alicorn, but she *isn't* a farmer. I've been doin' farm work my whole life, and I'm not sure it's somethin' you can just "figure out".

speaker: Rarity
text: Of course. [gasps] Why don't we pop back so you could explain to Twilight what to do next, and then we'll come back here and pick up where we left off?

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, I suppose I could try... assumin' everythin' went well so far.

speaker: Rarity
text: [laughing] Oh, Applejack, honestly! How could it not?

speaker: Spike
text: Wouldn't it be easier to just fly?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I told you, Spike. We're following Applejack's list to the letter, and Applejack doesn't fly! [straining] [yelps]

speaker: Applejack
text: I'm sorry, Rarity, but I think I'm gonna have to finish these chores myself.

speaker: Rarity
text: Twilight, darling! How in the world did you end up there?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Spike and I were just trying to follow Applejack's list as closely as possible.

speaker: Spike
text: Mmmh... Maybe not the best plan.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm sorry, Applejack, but we never even got started feeding the pigs.

speaker: Applejack
text: That's alright, Twilight. I know you did your best. I guess a list can't really capture all the ways I have of doin' things.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: At least you two got to spend some time at the spa together.

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah, that must've been super relaxing!

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, if watching Applejack fix plumbing counts as relaxing, then yes.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: What about your hour of spa perfection?

speaker: Rarity
text: As it turns out, the Ponyville Day Spa had a few problems with their steam room, and *somepony* refused to relax until she had fixed them.

speaker: Applejack
text: I'm sorry, but I just couldn't let those spa ponies go another minute puttin' up with problems they didn't even know they had! Somehow they just got used to a huge bottleneck of ponies standin' around waitin'. An' I took one good look at that spa jam, and I knew I had to do somethin'! Sometimes the simplest things can just derail a whole operation. [babbles] Whether it's a leaky pipe or doin' too much laundry. You can't just stick to the same old way of doin' things and expect them to get better. [clucking] I mean, thinkin' you can is just plumb ridiculous. Right? [short laugh] It's funny when you realize the extra work they were doin' was actually makin' things worse!

speaker: Applejack
text: I mean, I guess it's possible to get stuck in a routine where you're doin' all this extra stuff and not realize it, but I can't for the life of me think of how! [beat] Why are y'all starin' at me like that?

speaker: Rarity
text: Um... Are you certain everything you just did is entirely necessary to feed the pigs?

speaker: Applejack
text: What? Of course! Why would I be doin' it if it weren't? See, this gate here used to squeak so loud, the pigs would run to the other side of the pen and never come out! So I open and close it to let them know it's safe.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: But it doesn't squeak anymore.

speaker: Applejack
text: Of course not! I fixed that ages ago. Then I realized puttin' a little fright into 'em got 'em all hustlin' out of the pen.

speaker: Spike
text: They don't look scared to me.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, no. They got used to it. Which is why I started doin' the chicken dance! To show 'em that if they didn't get to eatin' their food, the chickens would. 'Course, bein' a chicken, I couldn't very well open the gate. Gettin' the food bucket to spill into the trough was just a happy accident because one time I left it there by mistake.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Uh, Applejack? It seems like everything you're doing is to fix things that aren't really problems anymore.

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, I'll be...

speaker: Rarity
text: Hmmm... Maybe it isn't so hard to get stuck doing extra work after all.

speaker: Applejack
text: Huh. I wonder if I've been doin' that around here with anythin' else.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, there's only one way to find out!

speaker: Applejack
text: [sighs] Thanks, y'all. I guess I just got so used to doin' everythin' a certain way, I didn't realize there were any problems.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Having a friend look at what you're doing with an outside eye can really help!

speaker: Rarity
text: Mm-hmm! And I suppose if it weren't for our unsuccessful time at the spa, none of us would've realized it.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Well, now that your chores are streamlined, what are you gonna do with all the extra time?

speaker: Applejack
text: I think I have a few ideas.

speaker: Applejack
text: [sighs] Think you can come up with enough things for us to do now that we have more time to relax?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, please. I could plan a week's worth of treatments!

speaker: Applejack
text: Heh. Well, let's just start with the rest of the day for now. After all the work we just did on the farm, I am ready for some serious relaxation!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] Thanks for letting me know there was an opening. I don't know if I could make it without my pampered muscle massage.

speaker: Aloe
text: Don't vorry about it. Shall I put you down for another one tomorrow?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Oh, absolutely! Sometimes a girl just has to pamper herself, am I right?

speaker: Rarity
text: You certainly are!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [gasps] [stammering] Oh! Hey! I was just, uh, uh...

speaker: Applejack
text: Gettin' a "sports" pamperin'? [giggles]

speaker: Rarity
text: [giggles] Don't worry, Rainbow Dash. We were just heading in for some pampering ourselves. You could always join us.

speaker: Applejack
text: That is, if you don't mind sufferin' through one or two "froufrou" treatments.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Uh... I *suppose* I could take it. You know, for you ponies.

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: We're so happy you could come have lunch with your father and me, Fluttershy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm so glad you asked.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And it was super awesome of you to invite me too! Things have been so busy with the Wonderbolts lately, it's great to get a chance to relax someplace quiet.

speaker: Mr Shy
text: That's exactly what I intend to do now that I've retired. In fact, I converted the back house to showcase my cloud collection. I have my clouds, your mom has her flowers, you've got your animals, and your brother...

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: Zephyr Breeze has his... interests. [nervous laugh]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I'll say! Remember when he was convinced square clouds were gonna be the next big thing? [laughs]

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: He's matured a lot since then.

speaker: Mr Shy
text: Actually, it's funny you bring Zephyr up...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, no! Not again!

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: It's just for a little while, dear. 'Til he gets back on his hooves.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Wait, you don't mean—!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Guess who's home! That's right, big sis, it's your one and only favorite little brother, *moi*.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Hi, Flutterbutter! How's the bestest big sister ever? Hey, where's the love? How about a little excitement to see your baby brother?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm just surprised. When you left, you said mane therapy was your calling.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Oh, it is, sis, it is. You would not believe how much stress ponies hold in their manes. Everything gets limp and unmanageable. No offense, but brushing alone won't solve the problem.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What went wrong?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Nothing went wrong, per se. It's just the powers that be were so locked into their required styles, and you know me. I've got my own style! And I think they were a little threatened.

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: O-Oh, this is... lovely, dear.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Ugh.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Welllll, if it ain't Rainbows "The Best Flyer There Ever Was" Dash!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [flatly] Oh, this ought to be good.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Sorry, I shouldn't tease you. I know the whole super awesome flyer bit's just to impress me.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Still, thanks for showing up for my homecoming. It's, it's sweet.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: I kinda thought there'd be more ponies here. I mean, what about your party planner friend, um... Sprinkle Pie! She could've turned this into a real house partay, am I right? I mean, this place could use it. [singsong] Drab!

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: Heh. I-I, eh...

speaker: Mr Shy
text: We have been meaning to redecorate...

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Dad, please. When I get all my stuff back in here, you won't even remember what this boring old place looked like!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [whispering] Um, Mom, Dad, can I talk to you for a second?

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: [sighs] What is it, honey?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm not so sure letting Zephyr move back home is a good idea. I know you both want to help, but don't you remember last time?

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: Zephyr's just trying to find his place, dear.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sighs] I know. It just seems like his place always ends up being *your* place. And then he sort of makes you do everything for him!

speaker: Mr Shy
text: Well, we may not be as bold as you, Fluttershy, but don't you worry. We know how to stand up for ourselves.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: And they were all like, "We love your free spirit, Zeph! And it would be wrong to cage that! Go follow your dreams!"

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: *Zeph* was just telling me all about the ins and outs of mane therapy school.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: It's all so political. I just could not take it!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Well, maybe if you stuck with it for more than a few weeks...

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Sorry, sis, but when something's not the right fit, this pony's gotta fly!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [yawns] Anyway, good talk, Rainbows. I am so touched you came to see me, really. I hate to deprive you of my presence, but this breeze needs his Z's.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You know it's the middle of the day, right?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: I know. [maracas in background] *Siesta*! I'm just gonna assume you made up my room the way I like it, right, Mom? Oh, I almost forgot! All my stuff is out front. Wanna grab that for me, Pops? [short laugh] Thanks.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] Same old Zeph.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I know you weren't expecting to see your brother, but you've been kind of quiet, even for you.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm sorry, but I am just so... so... *peeved* right now! [gasps] Excuse my language!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rainbow Dash! Fluttershy! It's me, Pinkie Pie! *Your friend!*

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, um, sorry about that.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: We just had lunch with Fluttershy's parents, and you'll never guess who showed up.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh! Mayor Mare? Cranky Doodle Donkey? Cheese Sandwich? Ms. Harshwhinny?!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Zephyr Breeze.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, that makes more sense.

speaker: Applejack
text: And from the look on your face, I'm guessin' it's for another one of his "extended stays"?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: She's a bit peeved.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Zephyr's my brother, and I love him. But he's never learned to do anything for himself. I don't know why my parents keep letting him trot all over them!

speaker: Applejack
text: Well, if your parents won't stand up for themselves, maybe *you* need to stand up for them.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You know, you're right!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Zephyr Breeze!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Oh, hey, sis. Come to see me work my magic and turn this place from drab to fab, huh? Well, watch and learn!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Can't you see what you're doing?!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Yeah! I'm getting rid of this old stuff so I can turn the backhouse into my art studio! I've decided I'm gonna be a sculptor!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm talking about Mom's flowers!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: She's gonna move them so I can have my meditation patio here. She loves replanting stuff. Don't you, Mom?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And Dad's been collecting his favorite bits of cloud from the factory since before you were born.

speaker: Mr Shy
text: The very best from every production run since my first day on the job. Ah!

speaker: Mr Shy
text: [sighs] But why hold onto the past really?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You can't just fly in and change everything Mom and Dad have built here.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: But this is the only place big enough for my studio/meditation garden. Ooh! Unless I do it in the living room!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [to her parents] I know speaking up for yourself can be hard, believe me, but Zephyr will never stand on his own if he can lean on you.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Don't be so dramatic, sis! Mom and Dad just wanna let me be me! Right? I can do plenty on my own.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I agree. Which is why you should move out.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Oh. Well... I mean, I-I totally would, but... I don't think that's what Mom and Dad want! It's not, is it?

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: Ehhh...

speaker: Mr Shy
text: You know we love you, son, but your sister has a point.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [tearing up] Sure. I mean, I really just came back here to keep you guys company, but... whatever's best for the family. I just... I just gotta grab a few essentials.

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: And... y-you definitely have somewhere else to go?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Of course! There's plenty of ponies who'd love for a little breeze to blow their way...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So... where's Zeph gonna go now?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm not sure. Oh, I hope I did the right thing...

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Are you kidding? One hundred percent!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [singsong] Hey, sis!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Your new roomie's here!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Okay, maybe like seventy percent.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Um, Zephyr. When Mom and Dad told you to find someplace else to live, I don't think they meant here.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Well, it's not *their* house, so by definition, it's someplace else. Am I right, Rainbows? Stop oogling me and help settle this.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [sighs] You know what? I totally forgot that I promised to help Pinkie Pie... sprinkle... something.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You said you had plenty of places to go!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Ehhhh...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [sighs] Fine. You can stay here—

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: You're the best! We're gonna have so much fun.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: On *one* condition.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Totally. Anything.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You have to get a job.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Cracking the whip, huh? You always were kind of bossy.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: [through gritted teeth] Zephyr Breeze...

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Kidding! Get a job. Absolutely.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [yawns] Where are we goin' so early? You have no idea how bad morning sun is for your mane.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Remember how we talked about you getting a job?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: It was just yesterday, and it's totally on my to-do list, but you can't expect to find something befitting my awesomeness overnight.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I thought you might say that.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So I did it for you.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: What?!

speaker: Rarity
text: These fabrics all need to be dyed those colors. Do you think you can handle that?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [muttering] Um, I don't know...

speaker: Rarity
text: You get started while Fluttershy and I head to the store for more supplies. Ta-ta!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Good luck!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Thanks for giving my brother a job. I just hope he's up to the task.

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, darling, dyeing fabric is the *simplest* thing!

speaker: Rarity
text: You just dip cloth in a bo—

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [humming to himself] Rarity, you're back!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: What did you do?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Since you talk to animals all the time, I just figured it runs in the family, so why not outsource this stuff, you know?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Turns out the animal communication thing isn't genetic.

speaker: Rarity
text: Zephyr, I asked *you* to do this job! Not to pawn it off on innocent woodland creatures!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Okay, I guess you have some feelings about this. But you should know it's basically your cat's fault for walking by and giving me the idea. But I'm actually kinda into this look!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: So I guess what I'm saying is... you're welcome?

speaker: Rarity
text: [frustrated stuttering] Zephyr, this is just *unacceptable*!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Wow. I guess I know when my efforts aren't appreciated.

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugghh!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Whoa! Those are tall!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: I'm glad you noticed, because they're your new job.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Wha? [to Fluttershy] You said you were taking me to tea with the princess!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Actually, I said *I* was going to tea with the princess. *You're* going to work.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Sis, c'mon!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Don't worry, Zephyr, it'll be easy. I just need a Pegasus pony to fly up and wipe each window down from top to bottom.

speaker: Spike
text: And I'm here to make sure you do it right.

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Wow, Zephyr! This looks amazing!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Uh, you know, like you said, it was easy!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Where's Spike?

speaker: Spike
text: Up here!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: You were supposed to supervise, not do all the work!

speaker: Spike
text: I was supervising! And then Zephyr asked me about different cleaning techniques and which one was best, and if I could— Hey! I did all the work!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Don't let him fool you. Old Spike is quite the taskmaster.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Oh, come on, sis. I had to ask Spike to make sure I was doing it right.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: You didn't do it at all! [inhales] Well, I guarantee there won't be any fooling around on the next job.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Next job?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: That's right, Zeph! You're coming with me!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: You don't have to come up with some excuse to hang out with me, Rainbows! Let's just go for a fly and see where the day takes us.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: [frustrated sigh] We're going to Wonderbolts Headquarters. And I am gonna give you a job so simple and straightforward, not even *you* can weasel your way out of it! [quickly] And the second you try, I'm gonna zap you with a storm cloud! Got it?!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Oh, I got it. I can already feel the electricity between us.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Rainbow Dash is crazy, okay?! She expects me to do stuff right when she asks me to do it! It's insane!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So you just quit? Again?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Escaped is more like it. Besides, what was I supposed to do?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Keep trying? Finish something for once? Maybe that way, you'd actually find something you like to do!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: That all sounds fine for your friends, but it's just not me.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Then I'm sorry, Zephyr, but I don't think you can live here.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Fine! I'll just go live in the woods like my foreponies before me! Guess the only breeze this zephyr can count on is his own!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Aw, cheer up, Fluttershy. I know it was hard, but you did the right thing. You couldn't let Zephyr pull the same stuff on you that he's always pulled on your folks!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I guess so...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, hello, Constance!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh? Oh, dear.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: See, Wigford? The Breeze needs nopony! We've got food, shelter. Just need to put the old kettle on...

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Come on, sticky-sticky, make with the sparks!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Ugh! What's a pony got to do to find a decent stick around here?!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Ugh. [grunting]

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: I know he needs to learn to do things for himself, but...

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh... I can't let him live like this.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Actually, I don't think he'd make it through the night.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [gasps] Fluttershy! Hey! I was just, um, cozying up in my sleeping bag! Ready to call it an early night! [mock-tired] Such an exhausting day, y'know?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: It's *noon*.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: You know me! [maracas in background] *Siesta*...

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Ugh... I can't do this. I can't do anything.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Zephyr, you're smart and talented. You *could* do anything if you just tried!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: And what if I give everything I have and still fail? Honestly, I think it's better not to try at all.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: But then you won't ever do anything.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: I don't expect you two to understand. I mean, when have *you* ever failed? You've literally helped save Equestria, like, a dozen times.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And I was worried that I'd fail every time! Sometimes you have to do things, even though you might fail.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: But failing is the worst!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: And quitting doesn't feel much better, does it?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: No.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: So here's the deal: You can come back with me, but you have to do *exactly* what I say. No exceptions.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [resigned] I will literally do anything you ask me if it means I don't have to stay here.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Okay, you know what you have to do, right?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Beg for help, then quit when I get frustrated. Just kidding! Total opposite of that. Got it.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: You think he can do it?

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
Everypony has times in their lives
When their hearts are filled with doubt

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text:
Frustration builds up inside
And it makes you want to shout

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
But if you just take that first step
The next one will appear

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
text:
And you find you can walk, then run
Then fly...!
Into the stratosphere

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
text:
You've got to give it your best
So you can pass the test
Give it everything that you've got

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
text:
And we know you can win
You just have to begin
Have to give it your very best shot

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text:
There are times when you want to give up
When you think that you can't go on

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
text:
But if you fight through with all of your might
You will find that you can't go wrong
That you could do it all along

speaker: Fluttershy
text:
Everypony has times in their lives
When their hearts are filled with doubt

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text:
But if you just give it your all
You'll start to work it out

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text:
And I know I can't give up too soon
Get myself in the zone
And I find I can walk, then run

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
Zephyr
text: Then fly...!

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: I can do it on my own

speaker: Fluttershy
Rainbow Dash
text: You can do it on your own

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text:
I can do it on my own
I can do it on my own

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: I did it! I actually finished something! By myself!

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: And it looks exactly like it's supposed to.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I knew you could do it, Zephyr.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: I didn't! But I do now. Thanks for believing in me, sis.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: That's what big sisters are for.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: So, Zeph, now that you've accomplished this, what's next?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: Anything I want! I mean, the sky's the limit, right?

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: But, y'know... I've got some baby steps in mind.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Thanks for dinner, Mr. and Mrs. Shy! Ha! It was great as usual.

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: Thank *you*, dear, for not giving up on Zephyr. After all these years of pining for him, it must be so satisfying to see him on the right track.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Huh...?

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Have you heard from Zephyr? Is he doing well?

speaker: Mr Shy
text: I tell you, he's a brand new pony! So full of drive and determination.

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Heh. That's great.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: [singsong] Guess who graduated from mane therapy training?

speaker: Rainbow Dash
text: Hah, awesome!

speaker: Mr Shy
text: Congratulations, son!

speaker: Mrs Shy
text: You look so handsome!

speaker: Fluttershy
text: I'm so proud of you, Zephyr.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: It was only a matter of time before they recognized my true genius! But actually doing the work probably helped, and I wouldn't have if it weren't for you.

speaker: Fluttershy
text: Oh, I just gave you some encouragement. You did this on your own.

speaker: Zephyr Breeze
text: And honestly, right now I feel like I can do anything... except find a place. I can still crash here for a few days, right?

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: As you've all probably noticed, it's been quite some time since the map has sent us on a mission of friendship.

speaker: Spike
text: Yeah! Ever since Starlight messed with it to go back in time and try to change history!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Yes. Since then. But, as part of her studies, Starlight's been assisting me. And together, we think we've come up with a spell that can get it working again!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [simultaneously] Ooh, well done!

speaker: Twilight Sparkle
text: Now without further ado...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Fluttershy and Twilight in Appleloosa! No, me and Rainbow Dash in Las Pegasus! No, Rainbow Dash and Twilight in Yakyakistan! No, Twilight and Twilight in Twilight's castle! Oh. Me! Me! Oh, me... and Rarity! Ooh! I hope it's some faraway place that nopony has gone before!

speaker: Rarity
text: [chuckles nervously] Well, maybe not *too* far away. An adventure somewhere that has modern conveniences would be preferable. [gasps] Canterlot! This is wonderful! I can check the boutique! Perhaps there'll be some social events that we can attend! [gasps] I'll have to pack extra outfits! *What will I wear?!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Y'know, some ponies get excited about the silliest things.

speaker: Rarity
text: [sighs] Now then, as far as finding a friendship problem, I suggest we start at the castle and begin to question the proper—

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, Rarity, you don't *find* a friendship problem. It finds *you*. We just need to go with the flow, and eventually, kablam! We get friendship problem'd right between the eyes.

speaker: Rarity
text: Well, this *is* a team effort, so if you feel we should go with the flow, then with the flow we shall go. But where's the flow saying we should go?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You know Canterlot. What do *you* think we should do?

speaker: Rarity
text: Hm. Take your pick. Culture, couture, cuisine!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, my. Well, it sounds like your stomach is saying we should flow towards some lunch? I know just where to go.

speaker: Rarity
text: Restaurant Row, the absolute best place for fine dining in all of Equestria!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Ooh, so many choices! Where should we go? This one? That one? Those ones?

speaker: Rarity
text: Any establishments that have this – the three-hoof rating.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Um, whose hooves?

speaker: Rarity
text: Why, Zesty Gourmand, the Queen of Cuisine. When it comes to food, she is the ultimate authority in Canterlot and thus all Equestria. She judges a restaurant on cuisine, decor, and presentation. Without her approval, a restaurant simply cannot survive.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What's so important about her approval?

speaker: Rarity
text: Zesty grew up around fine dining, and everypony hangs on her every word when it comes to cuisine.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Wow! Then the food here must be amazing! Lead the way, partner! Whee! [giggles]

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] Oh, my! Such presentation. Mm. Oh. [smacks lips] Ah. Yes. Very nice...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nom nom nom. [gulps, gags] Maybe, I'm not in the mood for... [whispers] whatever this is. Can we try someplace else?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nom nom. Ugh. Maybe one more stop?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Blech! Nope.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Maybe instead of trusting somepony else's hooves, *I* should pick the next place?

speaker: Rarity
text: Ugh! Very well.

speaker: Rarity
text: The Tasty Treat. It's very... rustic. [whispers] It looks like it hasn't even been rated.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Thank goodness! Hee-hee!

speaker: Rarity
text: Are we sure they're open?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [sniffs deeply] Mmmm. It *smells* open.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Oh! Are you here for lunch?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes, indeedy!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: I'm Saffron Masala, the chef here at The Tasty Treat, the most exotic cuisine in Canterlot. Would you like to hear about the specials?

speaker: Rarity
text: We're actually in a bit of a hur—

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes, please!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: We have a curried oat cake.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: We'll take one!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Uh, and a grass sandwich that has been marinated overnight in a mustard Dijon dressing.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: How can you say no to *that*?

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: A-And for you?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, me? Oh, I'm fine. Thank you. [aside, singsong, to Pinkie] No rating.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Hiya! What's your name?

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Coriander Cumin.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Are you a chef here too?

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: My daughter cooks. I host.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Then why are you stacking chairs?

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Without customers, I have nopony to host for. So I stack!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Father, stop it! Don't close up the restaurant around our guests.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: What does it matter?! When they leave, nopony else will be coming in.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Well, your attitude isn't going to bring anyone in! Can't you at least *pretend* to be positive?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [slurps] *So* good!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: You are doing enough pretending for the *both* of us. Nopony here wants to try anything new! I know when to throw in the towel!

speaker: Rarity
text: Um, Pinkie, perhaps we should excuse ourselves.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [muffled speaking] Oh, Rarity, try this!

speaker: Rarity
text: [munches] Ooh!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Maybe if you would listen to my ideas for once...

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Oh, yes! I did not move halfway across Equestria for my daughter that I never listen to!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [spits] Rarity, I think that friendship problem just kablammed us right between the eyes!

speaker: Rarity
text: These two? Oh, I don't know, darling. The food *is* excellent, but I'm not sure there's much you and I can do to help them.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: [scoffs] What would you have me do? We can't even get Zesty Gourmand to come to our restaurant. She took one look at how empty it was and said it wasn't even *worth* rating!

speaker: Rarity
text: That's it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes! Uh, what's it?

speaker: Rarity
text: The flow *has* led us here! *This* is our mission! [to Saffron and Coriander] We are going to get you a three-hoof rating and save your restaurant! I can get Zesty Gourmand here!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: [gasps] And I can pack this place with ponies!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Hmph. And how do you intend to do such a thing?

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: Just leave it to us!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Father, will you *please* stop packing things?!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: When the lovely pony comes back and says she couldn't convince Zesty Gourmand to come visit us, we will need to pack all this up. I am just getting a head start.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: You really don't know Rarity.

speaker: Rarity
text: [singsong] I've done it!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: See?

speaker: Rarity
text: It took all of my charm and cajoling, but I was able to convince Zesty Gourmand to come and try the food!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: What is the catch?

speaker: Rarity
text: Ah, yes. Well, um, there is a bit of a challenge. The only time she could make herself available is tonight.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Pfft. Oh, yeah, right.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: What is it?

speaker: Rarity
text: Zesty rates a restaurant on cuisine, decor, *and* presentation, and she has very specific tastes. If she's coming tonight, there *is* quite a bit of work that needs to get done.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Like what?

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, a tweak here, a tuck there, some slight modifications to the menu. [laughs nervously] We just need the place to feel more cosmopolitan.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Pfft.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Father, after Rarity went to all of this trouble for us, can't we at least try?

speaker: Rarity
text: Why don't I stay behind with Coriander to get the restaurant ready for Zesty's arrival? You and Saffron can try and drum up some business.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: One packed restaurant, coming right up!

speaker: Rarity
text: Coriander, I understand your trepidation. But I promise you, we will get those hooves by making this place feel just like all of the other restaurants on Restaurant Row!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: [sighs] I hope my father doesn't drive Rarity crazy.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: It'll be fine. Rarity's gonna make sure that The Tasty Treat is the most unique and beautiful restaurant in Canterlot! Not like all of those stuffy places on Restaurant Row.

speaker: Rarity
text:
Here's what I know:
If you want to succeed
You must follow the trends, that's the key

speaker: Rarity
text:
If you want to show
That you've got what it takes
You must be what they want you to be

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Here's what I know:
Your food is so good
The flavor's so fancy and free

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
You just need to show
That unique sense of taste
Go on, be yourself, let them see

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text:
It's gonna work
I know it's gonna work
It's gonna work out just fine, trust me
It's gonna work
I swear it's gonna work
It's gonna work out just fine, you'll see!

speaker: Rarity
text:
You need to change
If you want to compete
But fear not, for I know what to do

speaker: Rarity
text:
I know it feels strange
But trust me, when we're done
We'll make sure that you're a hit, too

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Don't ever change
Being different is good
Don't let what others do be your cue

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text:
Never rearrange
'Cause somepony said you should
Just trust your heart, it will know what to do

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text:
It's gonna work
I know it's gonna work
It's gonna work out just fine, trust me
It's gonna work
I swear it's gonna work
It's gonna work out just fine, you'll see!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Be unique

speaker: Rarity
text: Just be the same

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Trust your heart

speaker: Rarity
text: You'll make your name

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text:
We'll help you every step of the way
Because we know what you need to do
And you should know it too

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text:
It's gonna work
I know it's gonna work
It's gonna work out just fine, trust me
It's gonna work
I swear it's gonna work
It's gonna work out just fine, you'll see!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: [gasps] The day is almost over, and we haven't found any ponies! What will we do?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Try harder! Fillies and gentlecolts! Check out the super stupendous and amazing cuisine of The Tasty Treat! Grand re-opening tonight!

speaker: Citrus Blush
text: How many hooves does it have?

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: No hooves yet, but hopefully soon!

speaker: Cayenne
text: Well, when it gets rated, let us know.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rrrgh! Stupid hooves!

speaker: Chargrill Breadwinner
text: Oh, look at this, hun!

speaker: Orange Slice
text: Oh, The Tasty Treat! Do you think that's a restaurant, sugar?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Yes! Yes, it is!

speaker: Chargrill Breadwinner
text: We came to Canterlot from Whinnyapolis to be adventurous. But so far, the food in all these hoity-toity places tastes like somepony cooked up nothin' with a side o' nothin'.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Well, please, come try the Tasty Treat. I think it's going to be exactly what you're looking for.

speaker: Rarity
text: [sighs] This is going to be exactly what Zesty is looking for!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Father, we're ba— [gasps]

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rarity, what did you do?

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: [unenthusiastic] Welcome to The Tasty Treat. You can eat here if you want. Or not. Who cares?

speaker: Rarity
text: I know. Isn't it perfect? Zesty is sure to love it.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I thought we were trying to make this the most unique and beautiful restaurant in Canterlot! Not make it exactly like every other restaurant!

speaker: Rarity
text: [short laugh] We want to help our friends by getting them three hooves. That will only happen if this *is* like every other restaurant.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Father, what is *this*?!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Not that! *Anything but that!*

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: This is what we must cook if we want to succeed here!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: This isn't what I wanted! I wanted Canterlot to like us for us!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Rarity, how could you ruin the restaurant?!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, pff. Kch. Ts! We helped *save* the restaurant. Now, where are the other guests? How many other ponies are coming?

speaker: Pinkie Pie
Saffron Masala
text: Two.

speaker: Rarity
text: Just two?! I thought you said you could pack the place with ponies no matter what!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: *You* said you would make the restaurant better...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: ...so I guess we both didn't know what we were talking about!

speaker: Rarity
text: [gasps] Zesty Gourmand! Everypony, *places*!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: [unenthusiastic] Welcome to The Tasty Treat. What can I get you this evening?

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: I hardly think it matters, but by all means, try your best to impress.

speaker: Orange Slice
text: Well, we'll both try the special this evening. Maybe with a little kick to it, eh? Yeah, we've been craving some food with actual taste.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Saffron Masala, what are you doing?!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: I'm trying to save our reputations! [sips] I've given it at least a little bit of flavor.

speaker: Rarity
text: No-no-n-n-no, but that's not what Zesty wants!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: What kind of food expert doesn't want flavor?! *That's insane!*

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm taking this out there!

speaker: Rarity
text: No! Zesty will hate it! You are going to ruin this for them!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: No, I'm trying to fix it after *you* ruined it!

speaker: Rarity
Pinkie Pie
text: *Noooooo!*

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: I think we are done here.

speaker: Rarity
text: Zesty! Please wait! Allow me to explain!

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: Rarity, when it comes to fashion, you are adequate. But take some advice from a friend – keep your opinions out of restaurants. Substandard food, laughable service, and I would think even *you* could recognize that the decor here is trying desperately while desperately failing. Recommending a disreputable place such as this could do serious damage to your social standing.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Disreputable?! You mean a place with food that actually tastes good?

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: *Any*pony can throw ingredients together and create an obvious taste that uncultured ponies like those two can register.

speaker: Chargrill Breadwinner
text: Hey!

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: But it takes a *true* culinary artist to create a subtle taste, the barest hint of a sensation. That's what *I* bring to Canterlot. *That's* art.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: I'm *so* embarrassed.

speaker: Rarity
text: I don't know that there are words to adequately express how truly sorry we are.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: The worst has happened. No use crying over spilt food now.

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Here. This always cheered me up when I was younger.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: [gasps] My spicy flat-noodle soup!

speaker: Rarity
text: Oh, my! This is truly delightful!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Mmm, this is the best thing you've made so far! And I thought the food *before* was the best!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: That's all I've ever wanted to do, father! Make food for the ponies of Canterlot like the food we made together when I was younger!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: It has been so long since we cooked together. Heh. Remember how you used to hide the ingredients you did not like?

speaker: Rarity
text: You know what? Who cares what some stuffy unicorn thinks of the food here? It's exquisite.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's true.

speaker: Rarity
text: And you don't need three silly hooves in your window to prove it.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's double true!

speaker: Rarity
text: You just need ponies in here to give it a chance! Ponies that will tell everypony else in Canterlot that The Tasty Treat has the best food in the city!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: That's true times three!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: But without Zesty's approval, nopony will even try our food!

speaker: Rarity
text: Ohhhh, yes, they will. Pinkie, we *are* the perfect team for this! We were just doing the wrong jobs! *I* will go out and bring the crowd! You stay here and make sure this place is every bit as unique and rustic as it was the moment we walked in!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: And? What about us?

speaker: Rarity
text: You two? You are going to cook! Make whatever you want, and make a lot of it! I intend to bring a crowd!

speaker: Rarity
text: Would the owner of one of the premier boutiques in Canterlot put a stamp of approval on something that wasn't fabulous?

speaker: Rarity
text: It's almost time! Is everypony ready for the grand re-re-opening?

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Before we open, my father and I just wanted to say... Thank you for all of your help. We've both been so stressed about the restaurant succeeding that we forgot what it was we loved about it in the first place.

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Cooking is something we used to love to do together. No matter what happens next, thank you for reminding us of that.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Oh, you guys! Group hug!

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Now come on! We've got a party to throw!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: Welcome to The Tasty Treat! Make yourselves comfortable!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Please, feel free to sample the food!

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: What's this?! What is everypony doing here?! This place has no hooves! It is not in keeping with the level of cuisine that *I* have set for Canterlot! Nopony told you this place was acceptable!

speaker: Sweet Biscuit
text: Uh, Rarity and her friend said it was good? They told us!

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: *They* told you? And who are *they* to tell you anything? Rarity can tell you what hats to wear with which skirts. Her friend can tell you how to maintain a tragic look for a frizzy mane. They *can't* tell you what food you can eat!

speaker: Rarity
text: No, we can't, and neither can you! Nopony has the right to tell these ponies what to think! Zesty, you have very... specific...

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: And very strange!

speaker: Rarity
text: Yes, and very strange opinions about food, and that's your right. But just because you like your food a certain way, there is no reason to tell these ponies that they need to do the same!

speaker: Burly Unicorn
text: Rarity is right! I for one think the food here is delicious! I own The Smoked Oat on Restaurant Row; I hate the food we make! From now on, it's all smoked, basted, and grilled!

speaker: Matronly Pony
text: This food is an inspiration! I own The Bake Stop. I'm going to bake my mother's bundt cake the way she made it – full of flavor!

speaker: Rarity
text: Zesty, are you sure you wouldn't like to try the food? Ignoring a unique and fresh establishment such as this could do serious damage to your social standing.

speaker: Zesty Gourmand
text: Hmph!

speaker: Saffron Masala
text: Thank you so much!

speaker: Coriander Cumin
text: You are both truly amazing.

speaker: Pinkie Pie
text: Nothing can stop the dynamic duo of Pinkie and Rarity!
